string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Birth of Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996 : Development team from [The World] establishes the theory of Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000 : While testing Netsphere, the development is initialized due to an overload{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003 : Success in Beta version of Netsphere development{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004 : Dominic requests the development of an imaginary battle field{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006 : Complete Netsphere development.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007 : Government dominates and falsifies the code of Netsphere. The World loses control{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008 : Netsphere opens to [Leaguer] (Beginning of S4 League)
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Netsphere'in Doğuşu{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996 : [The World] geliştirme ekibi Netsphere teorisini kurdu{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000 : Netsphere test edilirken, geliştirme aşırı yüklenme yüzünden durduruldu{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003 : Netsphere geliştirmesinin Beta versiyonu başarılı oldu{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004 : Dominic hayali bir savaş alanının geliştirilmesini istedi{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006 : Netsphere geliştirilmesi tamamlandı.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007 : Hükümet domine etti ve Netsphere'in kodunu değiştirdi. The World kontrolü kaybetti{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008 : Netsphere [Leaguer] için açıldı (S4 League'in Başlangıcı)
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}La naissance de la Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996 : l'équipe de développement de l'organisation [The World] élabore la théorie de la Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000 : lors des premiers tests, une surcharge interrompt soudaiement son développement{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003 : la version Bêta du développement de la Netsphere est un succès{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004 : le gouvernement Dominic exige le développement d'un champ de bataille virtuel{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006 : développement de la Netsphere terminé{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007 : le gouvernement s'empare des codes de la Netsphere et les modifie. The World perd le contrôle du projet{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008 : la Netsphere ouvre ses portes aux [Leagueurs] (Lancement d'S4 League)
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Comienzo de la Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996 : El equipo de desarrollo de [The World] establece la teoría de la Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000 : Mientras se probaba la Netsphere, se inicia su desarrollo debido a una sobrecarga{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003 : Éxito en la versión Beta del desarrollo de la Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004 : Dominic solicita el desarrollo de un campo de batalla imaginario{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006 : Se completa el desarrollo de la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007 : El gobierno domina y falsifica el código de la Netsphere. The World pierde el control{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008 : La Netsphere se abre al [Leaguer] (Inicio de S4 League)
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Nascita della Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996: il team di sviluppo di [The World] istituisce la teoria della Netsphere{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000: durante il testing di Netsphere, lo sviluppo viene iniziato a causa di un sovraccarico{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003: ottimo risultato dello sviluppo di Netsphere in versione Beta{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004: Dominic richiede lo sviluppo di un campo di battaglia immaginario{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006: lo sviluppo di Netsphere è completato.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007: il governo prevale e falsifica il codice di Netsphere. The World perde il controllo{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008: la Netsphere è accessibile a [Leaguer] (esordio di S4 League)
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Рождение Netsphere {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}1996 год : Команда разработчиков из корпорации [The World] создали теорию существования Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2000 год : Из-за массовой перегрузки систем тестирование Netsphere было прекращено. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2003 год : Разработана успешная бета-версия Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2004 год : Правительство Dominic запросили права на разработку виртуального поля битвы. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2006 год : Конечная стадия разработки Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2007 год : Правительство доминирует и фальсифицирует код Netsphere. Корпорация The World теряет контроль. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}2008 год : Netsphere открывается для всех игроков [Leaguer] (Начало S4 League).

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}배경 스토리{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[도미닉]의 의뢰로 [더 월드]에서 [넷 스피어] 서비스 오픈한다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[도미닉]은 프로그램을 변조하고 권한을 [더 월드]에서 모두 빼앗고,{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}이를 눈치챈 [더 월드]는 모체, 체이서 바이러스를 투입 넷스피어 파괴를 목표로한다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}불리함을 감지한 [도미닉]에서 [리거]의 서비스 이용을 허용 바이러스 퇴치한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Hintergrundgeschichte{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Auf Wunsch von [Dominic] wird die [Netsphere] bei The World betrieben.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] verfälscht das Programm und entzieht [The World] die Macht über die Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] schleust die Viren Matrix und Chaser ein, um die Netsphere zu zerstören.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] bemerkt die Viren und macht den Dienst für [Leaguers] zugänglich, um die Viren auszulöschen.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Background Story{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Due to the request of [Dominic], opens [Netsphere] service at The World.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] falsifies the program and takes away the authority of [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] puts Matrix and Chaser Virus to destroy Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] detects a moment of viruses so let [Leaguer] to use the service to eradicate viruses.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Arka Plan Hikayesi{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] tarafından gelen istek üzerine, [Netsphere] hizmeti The World'de açıldı.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] programı manipüle etti ve [The World] tarafından sahip olunan otoriteyi aldı.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] Netsphere'i yok etmek için Matrix ve Chaser Virus'u aktive etti.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] virüsleri fark etti ve [Leaguer] virüsleri yok etsin diye hizmeti kullanmasına izin verdi.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Histoire{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sous l'impulsion du gouvernement [Dominic], les services de la [Netsphere] sont confiés à l'organisation The World.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Mais une fois le projet arrivé à son terme, le gouvernement modifie les codes du programme et se débarasse de [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World], conscient de la puissance de son programme, tente alors de le détruire et y infecte des virus : Matrix et Chaser.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Très vite, le gouvernement doit trouver une solution pour venir à bout de ces virus; la Netsphere est ouverte aux [Leagueurs].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Historia{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Debido a la petición de [Dominic], se abre la [Netsphere] en The World.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] falsifica el programa y le quita autoridad a [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] pone a Matrix y al Chaser Virus para destruir la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] detecta los virus así que permite que el [Leaguer] utilice el servicio para erradicarlos.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Storia di fondo{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}In seguito alla richiesta di [Dominic], il servizio di [Netsphere] è accessibile a The World.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] falsifica il programma e sottrae l'autorità di [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] inserisce i virus Matrix e Chaser per distruggere Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] individua una fase di virus e perciò lascia che [Leaguer] utilizzi il servizio per debellare i virus.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}История{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255} По приказу [Dominic] корпорация The World была вынуждена запустить сервис [Netsphere]. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] фальсифицировали программу и забрали у корпорации [The World] все права на авторство. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[The World] установили Matrix и Chaser Virus, чтобы разрушить Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Dominic] отследили угрозу и запустили [Leaguer], чтобы уничтожить вирусы под предлогом многопользовательского сервиса.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}背景故事{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}由“红蜂帝国”授权“艾斯波科技”开发“极限战网”。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}开发完成后，“艾斯波科技”的机密信息被“红蜂帝国”窃取。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}为了夺回控制权，“艾斯波科技”投入母体病毒、追猎者病毒来破坏极限战网。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}感受战局不利的“红蜂帝国”通过雇佣“自由联盟”来打赢病毒渗透战。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1세력 : 도미닉 (정부){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<시놉시스>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}정부의 기밀정보 보호 및 데이터 테러를 방지하기위해 가상의 방어공간 [넷 스피어] 제작을 다국적기업 [더월드]에게 의뢰.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}정부는 넷 스피어에서 임무를 수행할 [에스퍼 가드]를 창설 인간형 전투 프로그램을 교육하여 임무를 실행.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}넷 스피어 프로그램을 보안강화라는 목적으로 변조. (다른 단체의 정보조작과 정보 탄압이 목표.){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}정부활동 중 [모체 바이러스]와 [체이서 바이러스]의 발병으로 [에스퍼 가드]의 한계를 느낀 정부는 일반 유저 [가더]들을 용병신분으로 입장을 열어줌.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1. Kraft : Dominic (Regierung){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Zusammenfassung>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Auftrag an das multinationale Unternehmen [The World], die [Netsphere] aufzubauen.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Die Regierung setzt einen [Esper Guard] ein und bildet das humanoide Kampfprogramm zur Erfüllung seiner Aufgaben aus.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Verfälscht den Programmcode, um vertrauliche Informationen zu schützen. (Nutzt ihn jedoch gleichzeitig, um Informationen zu fabrizieren und die Verbreitung bestimmter Informationen einzudämmen.){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Die Regierung stößt mit dem Einsatz der [Esper Guards] an ihre Grenzen. Gleichzeitig machen der [Matrix Virus] und der [Chaser Virus] die [Guards] zu Söldnern.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1st force : Dominic (Government){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Request building [Netsphere] to the multinational corporation, [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Government establishes [Esper Guard] and trains humanoid battle program to carry out the duties.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Falsifies Netsphere program as a purpose of confidential information protection. (But, is planning to use it for creating information and information repression){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}The government experiences the limit during their activity [Esper Guard], while exercising [Matrix Virus], [Chaser Virus] and modifies users [Guarders] to Mercenaries.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1. güç: Dominik (Hükümet){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Çok uluslu şirket [The World] tarafından [Netsphere] ‘in geliştirilmesini ister.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hükümet [Esper Guard] birliğini kurar ve insansı savaş programını görevleri yapması için eğitir.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Netsphere programını gizli bilgileri saklamak için manipüle eder. (Ancak, onu enformasyon üretmek ve enformasyonu bastırmak için kullanmayı planlamaktadır){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hükümet [Esper Guard] aktivitesi sırasında, [Matrix Virus], [Chaser Virus] denerken ve kullanıcıları [Guarders] Mercenaries’e dönüştürürken limiti hisseder.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1ère force : le gouvernement Dominic{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Le gouvernement ordonne à la corporation multinationale [The World] la construction de la [Netsphere].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Le gouvernement crée les [Esper Guards] et entraîne des programmes humanoïdes pour mener à bien les missions.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Il modifie les codes de la Netsphere et prétexte la protection d'informations confidentielles (en réalité, le gouvernement projette de s'en servir pour contrôler les avatars){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Le gouvernement se voit contraint d'avorter le projet sous la menace des virus [Matrix] et [Chaser]. Les utilisateurs de la Netsphere sont transformés en mercenaires.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1° fuerza: Dominic (Gobierno){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Petición de construcción de la [Netsphere] a la corporación multinacional, [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}El gobierno establece [Esper Guard] y entrena con un programa de batalla humanoide para llevar a cabo las funciones.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Se falsifica el programa de la Netsphere con el objetivo de proteger la información confidencial. (Pero están planeando usarlo para fabricar información y para represión de la información){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}El gobierno experimenta el límite durante su actividad [Esper Guard], mientras ejercita [Matrix Virus], [Chaser Virus] y modifica los usuarios [Guarders] a los mercenarios.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Prima forza armata: Dominic (Governo){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Richiesta di costruire [Netsphere] alla multinazionale [The World].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Il Governo istituisce [Esper Guard] e prepara un programma di battaglie tra umanoidi per portare a termine i compiti.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Falsifica il programma Netsphere con l'obiettivo di proteggere le informazioni riservate. (Tuttavia, stanno programmando di utilizzarlo per la fabbricazione e la repressione delle informazioni){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Il Governo sperimenta il limite durante la sua attività [Esper Guard], mentre esegue [Matrix Virus], [Chaser Virus] e modifica gli utenti [Guarders] in Mercenari.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}1-я власть: Правительство Dominic{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Краткий обзор>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Запросили у международной корпорации [The World] разработать [Netsphere]. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Правительство устанавливает [Esper Guard], чтобы обучить гуманоидов боевой программе. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Фальсифицируют программу Netsphere, чтобы защитить конфиденциальный выход данных (Однако планируют использовать это для сбора информации и репрессии).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Правительство достигает предела в управлении [Esper Guard] в подавлении [Matrix Virus], [Chaser Virus] и превращает игроков [Guarders] в живых наемников.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}势力1：红蜂帝国{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}【简介】{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}为了保护本国的机密情报，防止互联网犯罪，委托跨国公司“艾斯波科技”制作虚拟战斗空间“极限战网”。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}帝国还创建了在“极限战网”中执行任务的“超能卫队”，通过训练人型机器人来完成任务。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}表面上，帝国宣称调整“极限战网”是为了增强数据安全性，其真实的目标是为了窃取其他组织的机密情报，并且对他们进行信息镇压。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}由于“母体病毒”和“追猎者病毒”的出现，帝国已经觉察到“超能卫队”的极限，因此决定开始雇佣精英用户“护卫”加入队伍。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<키워드>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●아카데미 : 에스퍼 가더를 양성하기 위한 교육기관.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●에스퍼 가드 : 넷 스피어에서 활동하는 정부의 무력단체.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●릴리트 : 에스퍼가더 정예병 중 하나. 오필리아의 숙적으로 S4세계관 전반으로 중요한 역할을 수행.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Stichwort>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Akademie: Schule, an der Esper Guards ausgebildet werden.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guards: Willkürlich agierende Regierungsorganisation in der Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: Eine der besten unter den Esper Guards. Ein alte Feindin Ophelias und mit einem wichtigen Auftrag betraut.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Academy: School for cultivating Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guard: Indiscriminate association of government in Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: One of the best in Esper Guards. An old enemy of Ophelia and undertakes an important assignment.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Akademi: Esper Guarder yetiştirmek için okul.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guard: Hükümetin Netsphere içindeki gelişigüzel birliği.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: En iyi Esper Guard’lardan biri. Ophelia’nın eski düşmanı ve çok önemli bir görevi var.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Mots-clefs>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255} L'Académie : une école où sont entraînés les Esper Guards.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guards : pions de l'association gouvernementale dans la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith : l'une des meilleures Esper Guards. Une vieille ennemi d'Ophélia qui doit porter d'importantes responsabilités.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Academy: Escuela para cultivar Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guard: Asociación indiscriminada del gobierno en la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: Una de las mejores en Esper Guards. Una vieja enemiga de Ophelia que emprende una misión muy importante.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Academy: scuola per l'educazione di Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guard: associazione di governo indiscriminata in Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: una delle migliori in Esper Guards. Una vecchia nemica di Ophelia, le viene assegnato un compito importante.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Ключевые слова>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Академия: Школа культивирования Esper Guard.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Esper Guard: Неизбирательная Ассоциация правительства в Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Lilith: Одна из лучших Esper Guard. Давний враг Ophelia и берется только за самые важные поручения.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2세력 : 더 월드 컴퍼니 (다국적기업){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<시놉시스>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}굴지의 다국적기업으로 엄청난 자본과 영향력을 소유.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}정부의 [넷 스피어] 제작을 의뢰받아 한정된 서비스를 오픈하였지만 갑작스런 정부의 넷 스피어 프로그램 변조로 서비스 컨트롤능력을 잃음.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[정부]는 넷 스피어를 통해 [더 월드]의 고급정보를 손상시키고, 이를 계기로 [더 월드]는 넷 스피어파괴를 결정.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}바이러스를 침투시켜 1차, 2차 공격을 시도했지만 파괴직전 [리거]를 고용한 정부에 의해 저지당함.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}최후의 수단으로 [더 월드]는 [리거]에게 의뢰하여 CODE:ZERON을 발동.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2. Kraft : The World (multinationales Unternehmen){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Zusammenfassung>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ein führendes multinationales Unternehmen mit großem Einfluss und Kapital.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Wurde von der Regierung mit der Entwicklung und dem Betrieb der Netsphere beauftragt, verliert aber durch Verfälschung des Programms die Kontrolle.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Nachdem die [Regierung] den Code verfälscht hat, beschließt The World, die Netsphere zu zerstören.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Greift die Netsphere in zwei Angriffen mit Viren an, die von der Regierung jedoch durch die rechtzeitige Entsendung der Leaguers aufgehalten werden können.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Als letzte Maßnahme setzt das Unternehmen den CODE:ZERON auf die Leaguers an.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2nd force : The World Company (Multinational Corporation){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}A leading mulinational corporation that is influential and possesses large capital.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Netsphere has received and opened the manufacturing order from the government, but loses control because of the sudden program falsification.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Government] damages the information of The World and decides to destroy the Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Tries the first and the second attack using virus, but the government blocks the progress by sending the Leaguers right before the destruction.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}As their last measure, they release CODE:ZERON by requesting it to the Leaguers.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2. güç : The World Şirketi (Çok Uluslu Şirket){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Etki sahibi ve büyük başkenti elinde tutan lider çok uluslu şirket.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Netsphere üretim emrini hükümetten aldı ve başlattı, fakat kontrolü ani program manipülasyonu yüzünden.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Government] The World’ün enformasyonuna zarar verdi ve Netsphere’i yok etme kararı aldı.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Virüsü kullanarak birinci ve ikinci atakları denedi, fakat hükümet bu işi Leaguer’ları tam yıkımdan önce göndererek engelledi.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Son önlemleri olarak, Leaguer’lar için CODE:ZERON’u yayınladılar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2ème force : la Compagnie The World (Corporation multinationale){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}The World est une corporation multinationale puissante et influente qui jouit d'un important capital.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}The World reçoit l'ordre du gouvernement d'élaborer le projet Netsphere, mais ils en perdent le contrôle rapidement et sont contraints de l'abandonner.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Le [Gouvernement] tente de faire disparaître The World après leur tentative de destruction de la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}The World, qui connait les dangers de la Netsphere, y infiltre des virus, mais le gouvernement contre-attaque en utilisant les Leagueurs pour les détruire.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Dans un ultime assaut, ils créent le CODE:ZERON.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2° fuerza : The World Company (Multinational Corporation){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Una corporación líder multinacional influyente y con un enorme capital.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}La Netsphere ha recibido y aceptado el pedido de fabricación del gobierno pero pierde el control debido a una inesperada falsificación del programa.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[El gobierno] daña la información de The World y decide destruir la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Intenta el primer y el segundo ataque usando virus, pero el gobierno bloquea el progreso enviando Leaguers justo antes de la destrucción.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Como última medida, ellos lanzan el CODE:ZERON solicitándolo a los Leaguers.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2a forza: The World Company (azienda multinazionale){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Un'azienda multinazionale molto influente che possiede grandi capitali.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Netsphere ha ricevuto l'ordine di produzione e l'ha avviato, ma perde il controllo a causa dell'improvvisa falsificazione del programma.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Government] danneggia le informazioni di The World e decide di distruggere la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Prova un primo e un secondo attacco utilizzando i virus, ma il governo lo blocca inviando i Leaguer appena prima della distruzione.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Come ultimo provvedimento, rilasciano il CODE: ZERON facendone richiesta ai Leaguers.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}2-е власть: Международная корпорация The World {N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Краткий обзор>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Влиятельная международная корпорация, которая обладает огромнейшим капиталом. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Корпорация получила право на разработку Netsphere и ее выпуск от правительства, но потеряла контроль из-за фальсификации данных. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Правительство] получило всю информацию из корпорации The World и решило забрать все права на Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}После первой и второй попытки остановить распространение вируса в Netsphere правительство подключило Leaguer участников прямо перед уничтожением. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}В качестве последней надежды корпорация запускает CODE:ZERON, внедрив его в Leaguer игроков.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<키워드>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●모체/체이서 바이러스 : 에스퍼 가더를 양성하기 위한 교육기관.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●[CODE:ZERON] : 넷 스피어 개발 시 폭주를 막기 위해 심어둔 강력한 자폭코드.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●오필리아 : CODE:ZERON으로 소환된 인간형 자폭 프로그램. 넷 스피어의 파괴를 목적으로 하고 있음.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Stichwort>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus : [The World] erkennt die wahren Absichten der Regierung und versucht, die Netsphere zu zerstören, indem es Viren in die Netsphere einschleust. Die ersten beiden Versuche werden jedoch von den [Guards] der Regierung vereitelt.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON] : Code, der die Netsphere zerstören soll.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia : Humanoides Zerstörungsprogramm des CODE:ZERON, das die Netsphere zerstören soll.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus : [The World] reads real intention of government and tries to destroy the Netsphere by putting viruses into Netsphere but 1st and 2nd attempts are failed due to [Guarder] from the government.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON] : destruct code of Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia : Humanoid destruct program summoned by CODE:ZERON with the purpose of destroying Netsphere
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus : [The World] hükümetin asıl amacını fark etti ve Netsphere’e virüsler yerleştirerek Netsphere’i yok etmeyi denediler ancak 1. ve 2. denemeler hükümetten gelen [Guarder] yüzünden başarısız oldu.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON] : Netsphere’in imha kodu.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia : CODE:ZERON tarafından çağrılan insansı imha programı, amacı Netsphere’i yok etmek.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Mots-clefs>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Virus Matrix / Virus Chaser : lorsque [The World] comprend les réelles intentions du gouvernement, ils décident d'infiltrer des virus dans la Netsphere. Malheureusement, les deux tentatives se soldent par un échec.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON] : un code supposé détruire la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophélia : programme de destruction de forme humaine invoqué par le CODE:ZERON : sa mission est de détruire la Netsphere.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus : [The World] conoce la verdadera intención del gobierno e intenta destruir la Netsphere poniendo virus en la Netsphere, pero el primer y el segundo intento fallan debido al [Guardia] del gobierno.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON] : código de destrucción de la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia : Programa de destrucción humanoide invocado por el CODE:ZERON con el propósito de destruir la Netsphere.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus: [The World] capisce la vera intenzione del governo e tenta di distruggere la Netsphere mettendo dei virus al suo interno, ma il 1° e il 2° tentativo falliscono a causa del [Guarder] dal governo.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON]: distruggono il codice della Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia: programma di distruzione di umanoidi chiamato CODE:ZERON con l'obiettivo di distruggere Netsphere.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Ключевые слова>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Matrix Virus / Chaser Virus: Корпорация [The World] своевременно выявляет цель правительства и пытается уничтожить Netsphere, однако первая и вторая попытка внедрить вирус были успешно предотвращены [Guard] охранниками. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[CODE:ZERON]: Код разрушения Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ophelia: Программа гуманоид, которую создали с помощью CODE:ZERON для уничтожения Netsphere.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}【关键词】{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●母体病毒/追猎者病毒：摧毁超能卫队的程序。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●泽罗代码：开发“极限战网”时，为了以防万一而安插的自我摧毁代码。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●奥菲利亚：用泽罗代码召唤出来的人型自爆装置，存在的目的就是为了破坏极限战网。

string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3. Kraft : Leaguers (Spieler){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Zusammenfassung>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Nehmen auf Wunsch der [Regierung] und auf Grund der Öffnung der Netsphere am Kampf gegen die Viren teil.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Nach dem Sieg über die Viren nehmen sie am künstlichen Kampftraining unter Aufsicht der [Regierung] teil.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Durch das Auftauchen von [Hacker G] werden die [Leaguers] stärker und bilden eine unabhängige Vereinigung, um sich von der [Regierung] abzuspalten. Arbeiten als Söldner und führen Missionen aus. (Neutral){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Aktivieren auf Wunsch eines [Leaguers] CODE:ZERON, ohne dessen wahre Absichten zu kennen.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Durch diesen Zwischenfall geraten die [Leaguers] in den Kampf zwischen der [Regierung] und [The World].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3rd force : Leaguer (User){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Participates at virus defense war by the request of [Government] and due to the opening of the Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}After winning the virus battle, they participate in synthetic battle training under control of the [Government].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Leaguer] gets stronger due to the appearance of [Hacker G] and forms a liberal union to seperate themselves from the [Government]. Works as mercinaries and carries out missions. (Neutral){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Activated CODE:ZERON at the request of one [Leaguer] without knowing the real intention.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Due to this incident, [Leaguers] participate to the battle between [Government] and [The World].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3. güç : Leaguer (Kullanıcı){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Government] tarafından gelen istek üzerine ve Netsphere’in açılışıyla birlikte virüs savunma savaşında yer alır.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Virüs savaşını kazandıktan sonra, [Government] kontrolünde sentetik savaş eğitimine katılırlar.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Leaguer] [Hacker G] ortaya çıktıktan sonra daha da güçlenir ve [Government] ile ayrılmak için kendi liberal birliğini kurar. Paralı asker olarak çalışırlar ve görevleri yerine getirirler. (Tarafsız){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Bir [Leaguer] tarafından gelen emirle ve gerçek amacını bilmeden CODE:ZERON’u aktive eder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Bu olay yüzünden, [Leaguers] [Government] ve [The World] arasındaki savaşa katılmak zorunda kalır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3ème force : Leagueurs (joueurs){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ils participent à la défense contre les virus sous les ordres du [Gouvernement] grâce à qui ils ont pu accéder à la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Après avoir vaincu les virus, ils sont formés lors de batailles virtuelles orchestrées par le [Gouvernement].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Les [Leaguers] deviennent de plus en plus forts, notamment après l'apparition des [Hackeurs G]. Dès lors, ils tentent de se libérer de l'emprise du [Gouvernement] pour former une union libre et mener leurs propres projets.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ils activent le CODE:ZERON à la demande d'un [Leagueur] sans en connaître la véritable puissance.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}À la suite de cet incident, les [Leagueurs] sont contraints à participer à la bataille qui oppose le [Gouvernement] à [The World].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3° fuerza : Leaguer (Usuario){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Participa en la guerra defensiva contra los virus por pedido del [Gobierno] debido a la apertura de la Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Luego de ganar la batalla contra los virus, participan en un entrenamiento para la batalla bajo el control del [Gobierno].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Leaguer] se hace más fuerte a causa de la aparición del [Hacker G] y forma una unión liberal para separarlos del [Gobierno]. Trabaja como mercenario y lleva a cabo misiones. (Neutral){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Activó el CODE:ZERON a pedido de un [Leaguer] sin conocer la verdadera intención.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}A causa de este incidente, los [Leaguers] participan de la batalla entre el [Gobierno] y [The World].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Terza forza armata: Leaguer (utente){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Synopsis>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Partecipa alla guerra di difesa dai virus richiesta dal [Government] e dovuta all'apertura della Netsphere.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Dopo aver vinto la battaglia contro i virus, partecipano a una breve battaglia di addestramento sotto il controllo del [Government].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}[Leaguer] diventa più forte a causa dell'aspetto di [Hacker G] e costituisce un'unione liberare per separararsi dal [Government]. Lavora come mercenario e compie delle missioni. (Neutral){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}CODE:ZERON attivato dietro richiesta di un [Leaguer], senza conoscere la vera intenzione.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}A causa di questo incidente, [Leaguers] partecipano alla battaglia tra il [Government] e [The World].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}3-я власть: Leaguer (Пользователь){N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Краткий обзор>{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Участвует в борьбе против вируса по просьбе [Правительства] и в качестве тестера Netsphere. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Победив вирус, они участвуют в симуляторе тренировочной программы под руководством [Правительства]. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}При появлении [Hacker G] все [Leaguer] пользователи становятся сильнее и создают либеральный союз, чтобы отделиться от власти [Правительства]. Став наемниками они выполняют разные миссии. (Neutral){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Во время случайного запроса одного из [Leaguer] был запущен CODE:ZERON. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}▼{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255} Из-за этого инцидента [Leaguer] пользователи теперь сражаются в битве между [Правительством] и [The World].

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<키워드>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●리거연합 : 일반 유저(용병)의 조합. 의뢰를 받아 미션을 수행하거나 가상 전투 프로그램(S4 리그)에 참여하는 등의 활동을 수행.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●해커 G : 리거 유입과정에서 출연한 5명의 해커집단. 정체는 밝혀진 바 없으며 [정부]의 추적에도 절대 잡히지 않음. 엄청난 실력을 소유하고 있으며 [리거]들의 우상.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●해킹 샵 : [정부]에서 [리거]들에게 지급하는 일반 보급품들을 해킹으로 봉인을 해제하거나 커스텀하여 [리거]들에게 판매하는 암시장.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Stichwort>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer Alliance : Spielervereinigung. Erfüllen Aufträge, nehmen am virtuellen Kampfprogramm (S4 League) teil usw.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G : 5 Hacker, die gemeinsam mit den Leaguers aufgetaucht sind. Ihre Identitäten sind geheim und können nicht von der Regierung nachverfolgt werden. Höchst talentiert und Vorbilder für die [Leaguers].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop : Ein Schwarzmarkt, auf dem nichtverkäufliche und angepasste Standarditems von der [Regierung] an [Leaguers] verkauft werden.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer Alliance : User association. Performs their duties at request or participates in the imaginary battle program (S4 league) and so on.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G : 5 hackers who appear with the influx of Leaguers. Identity has not been revealed and cannot be tracked down by the government. Fully talented and the icon of [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop : A black market where sells are being unlocked or customized standard items are sold from [Government] to [Leaguers].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer Alliance : Kullanıcı birliği. Görevlerini gelen emirler üzerine yerine getirir veya hayali savaş programı (S4 League) katılımcılarıdır ve benzer şeylerde yer alır.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G : Leaguer’ların istilasıyla ortaya çıkan 5 hacker. Kimlikleri bulunamıyor ve hükümet tarafından izleri sürülemiyor. Tamamen yetenekli ve [Leaguer] ikonu.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop : Tüm satışların kodunun kırıldığı ve standart eşyaların özelleştirilerek [Government] tarafından [Leaguers] ‘a satıldığı karaborsa piyasası.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Mots-clefs>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Alliance des Leagueurs : l'association des joueurs. Ils répondent à des missions ou s'affrontent dans un programme de batailles virtuelles baptisé S4 League.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hackeurs G : un groupe de 5 hackeurs soutenus par les Leagueurs. Leur identité reste à ce jour méconnue, c'est pour cela que même le gouvernement ne peut pas leur mettre la main dessus. Ce sont des hackeurs renommés et des modèles pour tous les [Leagueurs].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop : un marché noir où les objets classiques sont modifiés et revendus par le [Gouvernement] pour les [Leagueurs].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer Alliance : Asociación de usuarios. Lleva a cabo funciones a pedido o participa en el pograma de batallas imaginario (S4 League) y otros.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G : 5 hackers que aparecen con la llegada de los Leaguers. Su identidad no ha sido revelada y no pueden ser rastreados por el gobierno. Totalmente talentoso y el ícono de los [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop : Un mercado negro donde las ventas se desbloquean o los artículos personalizados estándar son vendidos del [Gobierno] a los [Leaguers].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Keyword>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer Alliance: associazione di utenti. Esegue i propri doveri su richiesta oppure partecipa al programma di battaglia immaginario (S4 league) e così via.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G: 5 hacker che appaiono con l'affluenza dei Leaguers. L'identità non è stata rivelata e non può essere rintracciata dal governo. Di grande talento, è l'icona di [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacking Shop: un mercato nero dove le vendite sono sbloccate oppure degli oggetti standard personalizzati vengono venduti dal [Government] ai [Leaguers].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}<Ключевые слова>{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Leaguer альянс: Ассоциация пользователей. Выполняют порученные им задания и участвуют в виртуальной программе битв (S4 league).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hacker G: 5 хакеров, которые прорвались в сеть во время регистрации обычных Leaguer пользователей. Правительство не может опознать и отследить их действия. Одаренные и абсолютно ничем не отличимые от обычных [Leaguer] пользователей. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Взломанный магазин: Черный рынок, где [Правительство] продает [Leaguer] пользователям еще не выпущенные и модернизированные предметы.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}【关键词】{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●自由阵线：精英用户(佣兵)组成的战斗团体，接受委托任务或参加虚拟战斗项目(极限战网)等活动。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●匿名者：由5名黑客组成的神秘组织，极限战网开放后出现并成为“自由联盟”的偶像。在“红蜂帝国”的追击中一直没有暴露身份，拥有强大的实力。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●黑客商店：开启、出售“红蜂帝国”所派发道具的黑市。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}릴리트{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 에스퍼 가드 (도미닉){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 에스퍼가드의 정예병 / 오필리아 봉인의 임무를 부여받음.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 넷 스피어의 탄생 후 상주하는 정부의 안드로이드. 에스퍼 가드의 정예 병사로 뛰어난 전투력을 보인다. 1차, 2차 바이러스 전투에도 큰 공을 세운다. 전투능력이 뛰어난 만큼 학습능력도 빨라 인간만큼의 “사고”를 지니고있다. 평시 임무 수행 중 오필리아의 봉인 임무를 받는다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Elitekämpferin der Esper Guards mit dem Auftrag, Ophelia einzudämmen.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Seit der Entstehung der Netsphere ansässiger Android. Als bester Esper Guard weist sie exzellente Kampfstärke auf. Spielt eine wichtige Rolle in den ersten zwei Viruskriegen. Lernpotential ist ebenfalls hoch, wodurch sie wie ein Mensch denken kann. Mit der Eindämmung von Ophelia beauftragt.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Best female of Esper Guard / An Ophelia sealing mission is granted.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Resident android of government after the birth of Netsphere. Best female of Esper Guard shows excellent fighting strength. Makes a great contribution in the 1st and 2nd virus war. Learning capabilities are also great so it has the ability to think like human. An Ophelia sealing mission is granted.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Esper Guard’ın en iyisi / Ophelia damgalı bir misyon kesin garantidir.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : Netsphere’in doğuşundan sonra hükümetin yerleşik androidi. Esper Guard’ın en iyisi olarak müthiş mücadele gücü gösterir. 1. Ve 2. Virüs savaşlarında büyük katkısı oldu. Öğrenme kabiliyeti ayrıca o kadar güçlü ki, bir insan gibi düşünebilme yetisine sahip. Ophelia damgalı bir misyon kesin garantidir.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Meilleure Esper féminin / Elle a pour mission d'éliminer Ophélia.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : après la création de la Netsphere, Lilith fut créée pour aider à l'élimination des virus. Très vite, on lui découvrit des capacités d'apprentissage extraordinaires. Les chercheurs se rendirent compte qu'elle apprenait presque aussi vite qu'un être humain. Dès lors, on lui donna pour mission d'éliminer Ophélia.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función: El mejor hombre de Esper Guard / Se concede una misión de sellado de Ophelia.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen: Android residente del gobierno después del nacimiento de la Netsphere. El mejor hombre de Esper Guard muestra un excelente poder de lucha. Hace un gran aporte en la primera y segunda guerra de virus. Sus habilidades de aprendizaje también son muy buenas así que posee la capacidad de pensar como humano. Se concede una misión de sellado de Ophelia.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}affiliazione: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: braccio destro di Esper Guard / Una missione di chiusura di Ophelia è garantita.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: l'android residente del governo dopo la nascita della Netsphere. Il braccio destro di Esper Guard mostra un'eccellente capacità di combattimento. Dà un ottimo contributo durante la prima e la seconda guerra contro i virus. Anche le abilità di apprendimento sono eccellenti perciò riesce a pensare come un umano. Una missione di chiusura di Ophelia è garantita.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Лучшая из отряда Esper Guard / Поручена миссия по остановке Ophelia.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Проживающий на территории правительства андроид, созданный сразу после рождения Netsphere. Имеет большое влияние в участии в 1-ой и 2-ой битве против вируса. Обладает возможностью обучаться, что позволяет ей думать и действовать как человек. Ей поручена миссия уничтожить Ophelia.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}莉莉丝{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：超能卫队 （红蜂帝国）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：超能卫队精英/被赋予封印奥菲利亚的任务{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：“极限战网”诞生后，“红蜂帝国”创造出的人形机器人。作为超能卫队的精英，有着异常强大的战斗力。在第一次、第二次病毒渗透战中立下大功。因其优秀的作战能力和学习能力，以及和人类一样的“思考”能力，被赋予执行封印奥菲利亚的任务。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}오필리아{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 더 월드 (다국적기업){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 넷 스피어의 자폭 수행 프로그램 (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 더 월드에서 넷 스피어 개발 시 만약을 고려하여 심어놓은 자폭 프로그램 CODE:ZERON의 임무수행 안드로이드. 인공지능을 탑재하고 있지만 전투능력에 치중되어있어 소속감, 사상 등은 존재하지 않는다. 더 월드의 CODE:ZERON발동에 의해 소환되어 머릿속에 각인된 넷 스피어의 파괴수행 중 릴리트를 만난다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : The World {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Programm zur Zerstörung der Netsphere (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Ein Android des Zerstörungsprogramms CODE:ZERON. Von The World entwickelt, als die Netsphere erfunden wurde. Auf Stärke fokussiert. Kein Gefühl für Besitz und keine Fähigkeit, wie ein Mensch zu denken. Trifft auf Lilith, als sie mit der Zerstörung der Netsphere beauftragt wird.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : The World (Multinational Corporation){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Destruct program of Netsphere (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : A mission android of the destruct program, CODE:ZERON, created by The World when Netsphere is invented. Focusing on fighting strength so cannot feel a sense of belonging or think like human. Meets Lilith while carrying out the mission for destroying Netsphere.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : The World (Çok Uluslu Şirket){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Netsphere imha programı (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : The World tarafından Netsphere icat edildiğinde kurulan imha programı CODE:ZERON’un görev androidi. Savaş gücüne odaklanır ki böylece aidiyat gibi insani hisler duymaz veya insan gibi düşünemez. Netsphere’i yok etme görevini icra ederken Lilith ile karşılaşır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophélia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : The World (Corporation multinationale){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : programme de destruction de la Netsphere (I.A.){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Ophélia fut créée à partir du CODE:ZERON, un programme codé de The World qui avait pour but de détruire la Netsphere. Elle a été programmée pour se battre et ne connait ni sentiment, ni forme d'humanité. Lors de sa mission destruction, elle a croisé la route d'une certaine Lilith...
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : The World (Corporación Multinational){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Destruir el programa de la Netsphere (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Un androide con la misión de destruir el programa, CODE:ZERON, creado por The World cuando se inventó la Netsphere. Se centra en el poder de la lucha así que no posee el sentido de pertenencia o pensamiento como el humano. Conoce a Lilith mientras lleva a cabo la misión de destruir la Netpshere.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: The World (azienda multinazionale){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: Distruggere il programma di Netsphere (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: un android del programma di distruzione, CODE:ZERON, creato da The World quando Netsphere viene inventata. Punta sulla forza di combattimento, così non può percepire un senso di appartenenza o pensare come un umano. Incontra Lilith mentre è impegnato nella missione di distruggere Netsphere.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ophelia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : The World (Международная корпорация). {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Программа разрушения Netsphere (AI).{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Андроид с миссией уничтожения программы, CODE:ZERON, запрограммирован корпорацией The World во время первого запуска Netsphere. Полностью боевая машина, поэтому она не способна думать и действовать как человек. На пути выполнения миссии по уничтожению Netsphere встречает Lilith.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}奥菲利亚{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：艾斯波科技{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：“极限战网”的自我摧毁程序{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：“艾斯波科技”开发“极限战网”时，为了以防万一而安插了可以摧毁程序的泽罗代码。作为执行程序的人型机器人，虽然装有人工智能，但功能主要集中在战斗上，并没有“人性”的一面。泽罗代码被启动后，在执行毁灭“极限战网”的任务中遇到了莉莉丝。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[더 월드]에서 넷 스피어 자폭코드인 CODE:ZERON발동하고, 오필리아가 탄생한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[도미닉]은 [릴리트]를 파견하고 [오필리아]를 봉인한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] aktiviert CODE:ZERON. Geburt Ophelias.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] entsendet [Lilith] und verbannt [Ophelia].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] activates CODE:ZERON. Birth of Ophelia.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] dispatches [Lilith] and seals [Ophelia].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] CODE:ZERON'u aktive eder. Ophelia'nın doğuşu.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] [Lilith] 'i gönderir ve [Ophelia] mühürlenir.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] active le CODE:ZERON : c'est la naissance d'Ophélia.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Le gouvernement [Dominic] contre-attaque et crée [Lilith] afin de capturer [Ophélia].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] activa el CODE:ZERON. Nacimiento de Ophelia.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] expulsa a [Lilith] y sella a [Ophelia].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] attiva il CODE:ZERON. Nascita di Ophelia.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] fa sparire [Lilith] e rinchiude [Ophelia].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] активирует CODE:ZERON. Рождение Ophelia.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] отправляет [Lilith] и останавливает [Ophelia].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“艾斯波科技”启动了自我摧毁的泽罗代码后，成功召唤出奥菲利亚。为了阻止自我摧毁程序，“红蜂帝国”派遣“莉莉丝”前去封印“奥菲利亚”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[리거]가 임무 수행 중 [오필리아]의 봉인을 해제하고, [릴리트]와 [오필리아]의 2차 전투 중 [에스퍼 가더]들이 난입한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[에스퍼 가더]는 [릴리트]를 배신하고 모두를 사살시도하지만 [오필리아]만 파괴되고 [릴리트]는 복수를 결심한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] lassen [Ophelia] während einer Mission frei. Während des zweiten Kampfes zwischen [Lilith] und [Ophelia] greifen die [Esper Guards] ein.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Die [Esper Guards] hintergehen [Lilith] und versuchen, alle zu töten. Jedoch wird nur [Ophelia] getötet. [Lilith] sinnt nach Rache.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] unseals [Ophelia] in the middle of performing a mission. While the 2nd battle between [Lilith] and [Ophelia], [Esper Guard] intrudes.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Esper Guard] betrays [Lilith] and tries to kill everybody but only [Ophelia] is destroyed and [Lilith] determines revenge.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] tam da bir görev yaparken [Ophelia] ‘nın mührünü kırar. [Lilith] ve [Ophelia] arasındaki 2. Savaş sürerken, [Esper Guard] davet edilmeksizin olaya dahil olur.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Esper Guard] [Lilith] ‘e ihanet eder ve herkesi öldürmeye çalışır ancak sadece [Ophelia] yok edilir ve [Lilith] intikam yemini eder.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Les [Leagueurs] libèrent [Ophélia] au cours d'une mission. Les [Esper Guards] se mêlent à ce nouvel affrontement entre [Lilith] et [Ophélia].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ils trahissent [Lilith] et se rebellent contre le gouvernement. [Ophélia] est détruite et [Lilith] promet de se venger pour la trahison dont elle a été victime.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] revela a [Ophelia] en el medio de una misión. Mientras se lleva a cabo la segunda batalla entre [Lilith] y [Ophelia], interviene [Esper Guard].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Esper Guard] traiciona a [Lilith] e intenta matar a todos, pero sólo [Ophelia] es destruida y [Lilith] decide vengarse.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] libera [Ophelia] durante una missione. Nel corso della seconda battaglia tra [Lilith] e [Ophelia], [Esper Guard] si intromette.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Esper Guard] tradisce [Lilith] e tenta di uccidere tutti ma distrugge solo [Ophelia] e [Lilith] invoca vendetta.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] пользователь освободил [Ophelia] во время прохождения миссии. Пока длилась вторая битва между [Lilith] и [Ophelia] появился [Esper Guard].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Esper Guard] предал [Lilith] и пытается убить всех кроме [Ophelia], после [Lilith] готовится к возмездию.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“自由联盟”成功解除了“奥菲利亚”的封印。在“莉莉丝”和“奥菲利亚”的决斗中，“超能卫队”闯入战斗现场，{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}并背叛了“莉莉丝”。但超能卫队最终只破坏了“奥菲利亚”。幸存下来的“莉莉丝”决定展开复仇。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}임페리얼가드 / 로얄가드{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 에스퍼 가드 (도미닉){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 에스퍼가드의 정예병 / 릴리트의 소멸임무를 부여받음.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 릴리트 복수에 대항하기 위해 릴리트의 파괴를 명받은 새로운 로직의 안드로이드. 전투 학습에 모든 AI가 집중되어있어 전투 이외의 지각은 둔하다. 파라메터 데이터에서는 각각 릴리트의 전투능력을 상회하는 파워와 스킬을 가지고 있지만 전투경험 부족으로 실전능력은 미지수.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Elitekämpfer der Esper Guards.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Neue Androiden für den Kampf gegen die auf Rache gesinnte Lilith. Alle AIs sind auf Stärke fokussiert, weshalb ihr Wahrnehmungsvermögen eingeschränkt ist. Sollen in Kräft und Können Lilith überlegen sein, jedoch sind ihre Kampfkapazitäten auf Grund fehlender Kampferfahrung noch unbekannt.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Best men of Esper Guard.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : New android for fighting against the revenge of Lilith. All AI are focused the fighting strength so lacks of perception. According to the data the parameter of power and skill exceed Lilith’s but has no experience of combat so the capacity for actual battle is yet to be known.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Esper Guard’ın en iyi adamları.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : Lilith’in intikamı karşısında savaşacak yeni android. Tüm AI savaş gücüne odaklı olduğundan algı ve hisleri yoktur. Bilgiye göre güç ve yetenek parametresi Lilith’inkini aşar fakat savaş deneyimi olmadığından gerçek savaştaki kapasitesinin ne olacağı henüz bilinmemektedir.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Meilleur Esper masculin.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : androïd crée pour mettre un terme à la revanche programmée de Lilith, ces gardes ont tout dans les muscles et rien dans la tête. D'après notre base de données, leur puissance est supérieure à celle de Lilith, mais leur expérience au combat est si faible que leur efficacité reste encore à prouver.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Mejores hombres de Esper Guard.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Nuevo androide para luchar contra la venganza de Lilith. Todos los AIs se centran en el poder de combate, así que carecen de percepción. De acuerdo a la información, el parámetro de poderes y habilidades exceden los de Lilith, pero no tiene experiencia en combate así que aún se desconoce la capacidad real para la lucha.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: braccio destro di Esper Guard.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: nuovo android per affrontare la vendetta di Lilith. Tutti gli AI puntano sulla forza di combattimento e mancano di percezione. Secondo i dati, potere e abilita superano quelli di Lilith ma non hanno esperienza di combattimento, perciò l'attuale capacità di affrontare una battaglia non è ancora nota.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Imperial Guard / Royal Guard{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Лучший защитник из Esper Guard.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Новый андроид, созданный для противостояния Lilith. Все AI созданы для сражений, поэтому человеческие чувства вне их восприятия. Согласно параметрам все данные этого андроида значительно превосходят Lilith, но у него отсутствует боевая техника, поэтому его потенциал до сих пор не раскрыт.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}帝国护卫/皇家护卫{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：超能卫队 （红蜂帝国）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：超能卫队精英/被赋予消灭莉莉丝的任务{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：为了对抗莉莉丝的复仇，所有人型机器人都将程序功能集中在战斗技巧的学习上，因此对战斗以外的一切功能都反应迟钝。参数数据中有着提升战斗力的功能和技巧，但是由于战斗经验不足，实战能力尚不可知。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}복수를 결심한 [릴리트]는 [리거]에게 의뢰를 하고 리거는 이를 받아들인다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] sinnt auf Rache und heuert [Leaguers] an.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] determines revenge and hires [Leaguer].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] intikam ilan eder ve [Leaguer] 'ı kiralar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] prépare sa revanche et s'associe aux [Leagueurs].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] decide vengarse y contrata a un [Leaguer].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] invoca vendetta e ingaggia [Leaguer].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith] готовится к мести и призывает [Leaguer] пользователей.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}决心复仇的“莉莉丝”委托“自由联盟”作为支援力量参与战斗，“自由联盟”接受了委托。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[릴리트&리거]는 [에스퍼 가드]에 처들어가지만 새로운 안드로이드 [로열가드&임패리얼가드]에 의해 [릴리트]의 소스가 분해되고 공격은 무산된다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith und die Leaguers] überfallen die [Esper Guards]. Der Code von [Lilith] wird von den neuen Androiden, [Royal Guard und Imperial Guard], zerstört.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & Leaguer] invade [Esper Guard] but the source of [Lilith] is smashed by new androids, [Royal Guard & Imperial Guard].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & Leaguer] [Esper Guard] 'ı işgal eder fakat [Lilith] 'in kaynağı yeni androidler [Royal Guard & Imperial Guard] tarafından parçalanır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & les Leagueurs] prennent d'assaut les [Esper Guards], mais les ambitions de [Lilith] sont brutalement arrêtées par l'arrivée de nouveaux androïdes : les [Royal Guards & Imperial Guards].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & Leaguer] invaden [Esper Guard] pero la fuente de [Lilith] es destruida por los nuevos androides, [Royal Guard y Imperial Guard].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & Leaguer] invadono [Esper Guard] ma la fonte di [Lilith] è distrutta dai nuovi android [Royal Guard & Imperial Guard].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Lilith & Leaguer] вторгаются в зону [Esper Guard], но все планы [Lilith] оказались ничтожны против новой армии андроидов [Royal Guard & Imperial Guard].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}虽然“莉莉丝&自由联盟”闯进“超能卫队”的基地，但是由于新的人工智能“皇家护卫&帝国护卫”的加入，“莉莉丝”的能源供给被毁坏，复仇计划宣告失败。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}조 / 켈리{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 리거연합{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : 유저 (아바타){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 리거연합의 초대리더{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : S4리그 터치다운의 1위 클럽의 선수인 [조&켈리]는 어느날 [해커G]와 조우하여 현재 [도미닉]과 [더 월드]의 관계 및 [넷 스피어]의 비밀을 듣게 되고, 이를 통해 리거연합의 초대리더로 추앙 받는다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : Spieler (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Gewählte Anführer der Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : [Joe und Kelly] sind Spieler des besten Touchdown-Clubs von S4 League und begegnen [Hacker G]. Sie erfahren vom Verhältnis zwischen [Dominic] und [The World] und dem Geheimnis der Netsphere, weshalb sie als Anführer der Leaguer Alliance betrachtet werden.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Invited leader of Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : [Joe and Kelly] are players of S4 League Top Touchdown club and meet [Hacker G]. Then, hear the relationship of [Dominic] and [The World] and the secret of Netsphere. Therefore, they revere as the leaders of Leaguer Alliance.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : Kullanıcı (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Leaguer Alliance’ın davet edilmiş lideri{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : [Joe ve Kelly] S4 League Top Touchdown kulübü oyuncularıdır ve [Hacker G] ile tanışırlar. Daha sonra, [Dominic] ve [The World] arasındaki ilişkiyi öğrenirler ve Netsphere’in sırrını duyarlar. Böylece Leaguer Alliance’ın lideri haline gelirler.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Alliance des Leagueurs{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : utilisateurs (avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : commandement de l'Alliance des Leagueurs{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : lorsque [Joe et Kelly], deux joueurs d'S4 League du Touchdown Club, entendent parler du coup monté entre le gouvernement [Dominic] et [The World], ils décident de s'allier aux hackeurs pour renverser le pouvoir. Dès lors, ils décident de créer l'Alliance des Leagueurs pour découvrir tous les secrets de la Netsphere.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Líder invitado de Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : [Joe y Kelly] son jugadores del club S4 League Top Touchdown y conocen a [Hacker G]. Más adelante, se enteran de la relación entre [Dominic] y [The World] y el secreto de la Netsphere. Por eso son venerados como los líderes de Leaguer Alliance.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: utente (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: leader ospite della Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: [Joe and Kelly] sono giocatori del club Top Touchdown di S4 e incontrano [Hacker G]. In seguito, vengono a conoscenza della relazione tra [Dominic] e [The World] e scoprono il segreto di Netsphere. Da quel momento, vengono considerati i leader della Leaguer Alliance.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Joe / Kelly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Leaguer Альянс{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игроки : Пользователи (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Приглашенные лидеры в Leaguer Альянс{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : [Joe и Kelly] являются лучшими игроками из Touchdown клуба в S4 League, которым удалось встретиться с [Hacker G]. Потом об их связи узнали [Dominic] правительство и [The World], позже раскрылся и секрет Netsphere. Благодаря своей репутации они стали известны как лидеры Leaguer Альянса.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[리거]들은 이 사건으로 [도미닉]의 탄압을 받는다. [조&켈리]는 [도미닉]에게 항전을 선포 게릴라전을 펼치게 되고, 인지도가 높은 둘을 따르는 리거들은 점점 전투에 점여한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Nach diesem Zwischenfall versucht [Dominic], die [Leaguers] zu unterdrücken. [Joe und Kelly] kämpfen gegen [Dominic], die [Leaguers] beteiligen sich am Kampf der beiden.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] are suppressed by [Dominic] due to this incident. [Joe & Kelly] fight against [Dominic] and [Leaguers] participate into the battle with them.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] bu olay yüzünden [Dominic] tarafından zaptedilir. [Joe & Kelly] [Dominic] 'e karşı savaşır ve [Leaguers] bu savaşa onlarla birlikte girer.
