string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Les [Leagueurs] sont repoussés par le gouvernement [Dominic] à la suite de cet incident. Cepenant, [Joe & Kelly] continuent de se battre et c'est aidé des [Leagueurs] qu'ils sont déterminés à mettre un terme à cette menace.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Los [Leaguers] son excluidos por [Dominic] debido a este incidente. [Joe y Jelly] luchan contra [Dominic] y los [Leaguers] participan en la batalla con ellos.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] vengono eliminati da [Dominic] a causa di questo incidente. [Joe & Jelly] combattono contro [Dominic] e [Leaguers] partecipano alla battaglia insieme a loro.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Узнав всю правду [Leaguer] пользователи были полностью подавлены [Dominic] правительством. [Joe & Kelly] вступили в битву против [Dominic] и [Leaguer] пользователи поддержали их в этой битве.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“自由联盟”因为“匿名者”的窃密事件而被“红蜂帝国”压迫。在“乔&凯丽”向“红蜂帝国”宣战后，由于他们高涨的人气，许多“自由联盟”成员也选择在其麾下效力。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[해커G]는 [도미닉]에서 숨겨왔던 무기인 [카타나&시그마블레이드]를 커스터마이징하여 리거들에게 지급한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[리거]들은 [조&켈리]를 연합리더로 추앙하고 기나긴 전투 끝에 [도미닉]에서 독립 [리거연합]을 결성한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] modifizieren [Dominics] [Katana & Sigma Blade] und machen sie den [Leaguers] zugänglich.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Die [Leaguers] verehren [Joe und Kelly] als Anführer der Allianz und die [Leaguer Alliance] spaltet sich von [Dominic] ab.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] customizes [Katana & Sigma Blade] from [Dominic] and provides to [Leaguers].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] revere [Joe & Kelly] as the leaders of Leaguer Alliance and organize [Leaguer Alliance] from [Dominic].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] [Dominic] ‘den [Katana & Sigma Blade] ‘i özelleştirir ve [Leaguers] ‘a verir.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] [Joe & Kelly] ‘i Leaguer Alliance’ın liderleri olarak kutsar ve [Dominic] ‘den [Leaguer Alliance] ‘ı organize eder.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Les [Hackeurs G] améliorent le [Katana & la Sigma Blade] récupérés sur les soldats du gouvernement et les offrent aux [Leagueurs].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ces derniers décident alors d'accepter [Joe & Kelly] en tant que chefs de l'Alliance des Leagueurs et préparent leur revanche.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] personaliza los [Katana y Sigma Blade] de [Dominic] y se las da a los [Leaguers].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] veneran a [Joe y Kelly] como los líderes de Leaguer Alliance y organizan la [Leaguer Alliance] de [Dominic].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] personalizza [Katana & Sigma Blade] da [Dominic] e si occupa dei [Leaguers].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] considerano [Joe & Kelly] i leader della Leaguer Alliance e organizzano la [Leaguer Alliance] da [Dominic].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Hacker G] модернизировал [Katana & Sigma Blade] полученный от [Dominic] правительства и раздал копии [Leaguer] пользователям. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguer] пользователи стали уважать [Joe & Kelly] как лидеров Leaguer Альянса и создали новый [Leaguer Альянс] из [Dominic] правительства.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“匿名者”向“自由联盟”提供了“红蜂帝国”的秘密武器“斩魄太刀&契约之刃”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“自由联盟”把“乔&凯丽”奉为领袖，并在他们的带领下，经过漫长的斗争后，终于从“红蜂帝国”的控制下独立，组成“自由阵线”。

string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice & son pays des Merveilles

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}엘리스{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 아카데미 (도미닉){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 에스퍼가더의 전투스킬 오퍼레이터.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 지속적인 공격으로 약해진 [도미닉]은 [에스퍼 가더]육성을 위한 프로그램 엘리스를 가동한다. [엘리스]는 현 시점의 [에스퍼 가더]에게 가장 적합한 훈련방식인 [모의전:컨퀘스트]를 구축한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Akademie (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Kampfausbilderin der Esper Guards.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : [Dominic] wird durch die andauernden Angriffe geschwächt und setzt das Programm Alice ein. [Alice] ruft [Battle : Conquest] ins Leben - das perfekte Training für die [Esper Guards].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Academy (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Battle-skill Operator of Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : [Dominic] gets weaker because of continuous attack, therefore operates the program Alice. [Alice] builds [Battle : Conquest] that is the perfect training for [Esper Guarder].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Akademi (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Esper Guarder’ın savaş-yetenekleri operatörü.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : [Dominic] sürekli saldırılar yüzünden güçsüz düşer, bu yüzden Alice programını çalıştırır. [Alice] [Esper Guarder] için kusursuz bir eğitim olan [Battle : Conquest] ‘i kurar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Académie (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Coordinatrice des Esper Guards.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : à cause des attaques répétées contre lui, le gouvernement s'affaiblit. Pour se défendre, il décide de créer le programme Alice et son pays des Merveilles, une zone d'entraînement avancée pour les [Esper Guards].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Academy (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Operador con habilidades para la batalla de Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : [Dominic] se debilita a causa de los continuos ataques, por lo tanto pone en funcionamiento el programa Alice. [Alice] inicia [Battle : Conquest] que es el entrenamiento perfecto para [Esper Guarder].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Academy (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: Operatore di Esper Guarder portato per le battaglie.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: [Dominic] si indebolisce a causa dei continui attacchi, perciò è Alice a condurre il programma. [Alice] costruisce [Battle : Conquest], l'addestramento perfetto per [Esper Guarder].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Академия (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Оператор боевых навыков из Esper Guarder.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : [Dominic] правительство полностью ослабло из-за продолжительных атак, поэтому как последний отпор они запустили программу Alice. [Alice] включает в себя [Битву: Conquest], которая идеально подходит для обучения [Esper Guarder].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}爱丽丝计划{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：阿卡德米（红蜂帝国）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：超能卫队的精英用户{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：因为“自由联盟”持续性的攻击，“红蜂帝国”的实力受到严重削弱。为了提升“超能卫队”的战斗力，帝国启动了全新的培训程序“爱丽丝计划”，该程序拥有最先进的培训系统[人机模式：防守闯关]。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}클락레빗 / 엘리스{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 도미닉 (에스퍼 가드){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : 유저 (아바타){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 프로젝트 엘리스에서 발탁된 [리거]출신 에스퍼가더.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : [프로젝트 : 엘리스]를 통해 리거에서 [에스퍼 가더]로 발탁된 특이 케이스. 실제로 기업 총수의 딸인 [엘리스]는 행실이 불량해 골칫거리 취급을 받지만, 그의 집사[클락 레빗]은 과묵한 성격으로 신뢰를 받으며 입지를 굳혀가고있다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Dominic (Esper Guards){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : Spieler (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Zum Esper Guard beförderter [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Wird durch [Project: Alice] vom [Leaguer] zum [Esper Guard]. [Alice] ist die Tochter des Anführers, fällt jedoch in Ungnade. Ihr Butler, [Clock Rabbit], ist schweigsam und vertrauenswürdig und bleibt ihr enger Vertrauter.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Dominic (Esper Guard){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Scouted Esper Guarder from [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Scouted from [Leaguer] to [Esper Guarder] through [Project : Alice]. [Alice] is the daugther of head but misbehaved. However, her butler, [Clock Rabbit], is taciturn and well-trusted and holds his position as a good man.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Dominic (Esper Guard){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : Kullanıcı (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : [Leaguer] ‘dan öncü Esper Guarder. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : [Leaguer] ‘dan [Project : Alice] boyunca öncü Esper Guarder. [Alice] liderin kızıdır fakat yaramazlık yapar. Fakat, uşağı [Clock Rabbit], sessiz ve güvenilirdir ve iyi bir adam olmaya devam eder.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lapin blanc / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Dominic (Esper Guards){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : utilisateurs (avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Espions envoyés par les [Leagueurs].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : les [Leagueurs] envahissent littéralement les [Esper Guards] qui sont contraints de battre en retraite. Mais le gouvernement n'a pas dit son dernier mot et lance le [Projet : Alice]. [Alice] est une jeune fille indisciplinée. Heureusement pour elle, le [Lapin blanc], son fidèle serviteur, est toujours là pour la remettre dans le droit chemin.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Dominic (Esper Guard){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : Usuario (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Esper Guarder reconocido de [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Reconocido de [Leaguer] a [Esper Guarder] a través del [Project : Alice]. [Alice] es la hija del jefe, pero es muy maleducada. Sin embargo, su mayordomo, [Clock Rabbit], es taciturno y de confianza y se lo conoce como un buen hombre.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Dominic (Esper Guard){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: utente (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: Esper Guarder scoperto da [Leag,uer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: scoperto da [Leaguer] a [Esper Guarder] tramite [Project : Alice]. [Alice] è la figlia del capo ma si comporta male. Tuttavia, il suo domestico, [Clock Rabbit], è taciturno e rispettato e gode di ottima reputazione.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Clock Rabbit / Alice{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Dominic (Esper Guard){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : Пользователь (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Разведчик Esper Guarder из [Leaguer].{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Разведчик из [Leaguer] и [Esper Guarder] работающий на [Проект : Alice]. [Alice] приходится дочерью главы правительства, но ее характер абсолютно невыносим. Ее дворецкий [Clock Rabbit] молчалив и является тем самым человеком кому всегда можно доверять.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}爱丽丝/兔子克拉克{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：红蜂帝国（超能卫队）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：精英用户（虚拟替身）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：原是“自由联盟”的一员/因为“爱丽丝计划”而加入“超能卫队”{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：原是“自由联盟”的一员，因为“爱丽丝计划”而被选入“超能卫队”。事实上，作为企业总裁女儿，“爱丽丝”是个问题少女，而她的管家“兔子克拉克”虽然沉默寡言，但是做事稳重而深受信赖。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}지속적인 바이러스 공격과 [리거]와의 전투 후 [에스퍼 가드]의 전력 50%를 손실한 [도미닉]은 [아카데미] 강화를 준비.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}도미닉은 전투AI 훈련 시스템 [프로젝트 앨리스]를 개발, 발동 시킨다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Nach den anhaltenden Virusangriffen und dem Kampf gegen die [Leaguers] verlieren die [Esper Guards] 50% ihrer Stärke. Daraufhin bereitet [Dominic] die Stärkung der [Akademie] vor.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic erschafft und aktiviert das AI-Trainingssystem [Project: Alice].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}After the continuous virus attack and battle with [Leaguer], [Esper Guard] loses 50% of strength so [Dominic] prepares for strengthening [Academy].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic creates and activates the battle AI training system, [Project Alice].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Süregelen virüs saldırısından ve [Leaguer] ile savaştan sonra, [Esper Guard] gücünün %50’sini kaybeder ve böylece [Dominic] güçlendirme çalışmalarına başlar [Academy].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic AI eğitim sistemini kurar ve aktive eder: [Project Alice].
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}À cause des virus incessants lancés par les [Leagueurs], les gardes du gouvernement sont grandement affaiblis. [Dominic] décide de renforcer l'Académie afin de créer de nouveaux gardes plus puissants que jamais.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Baptisé le [Projet : Alice], il consiste en un système d'entraînement avancé assisté par ordinateur.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Luego del continuo ataque de virus y la lucha con el [Leaguer], [Esper Guard] pierde el 50% de la fuerza, así que [Dominic] se prepara para fortalecer [Academy].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic crea y activa el sistema de entrenamiento de AIs para la batalla, [Project Alice].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dopo i continui attacchi virus e le battaglie con [Leaguer], [Esper Guard] perde il 50% di forza, perciò [Dominic] si prepara per portare rinforzi a [Academy].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic crea e attiva il sistema di addestramento al combattimento di Al, [Project Alice].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}После продолжительных вирусных атак и битв с [Leaguer], [Esper Guard] потеряли 50% своих сил и поэтому [Dominic] правительство занялось укреплением [Академии].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dominic создало и запустило новую тренировочную AI систему именуемую [Проект Alice].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}在与“自由联盟”的持久战后，“超能卫队”战损已经过半。为了重振旗鼓，“红蜂帝国”开发并推出了全新的人工智能训练项目，“爱丽丝计划”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[프로젝트 엘리스]가동 중 리거인 [엘리스]와 보디가드 [클락레빗]이 무단으로 침투한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}이들은 [에스퍼 가더]들이 기록하지 못한 최고 점수를 기록하고, 이를 눈여겨 본 [프로젝트 엘리스]의 책임자는 [엘리스]를 [에스퍼 가더]입단을 권유하고, [클락 레빗]까지 합류하는 것을 조건으로 둘은 입단하고 곧 이어질 전투를 위해 정식으로 훈련을 받는다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] und ihr Leibwächter [Clock Rabbit] betreten heimlich das [Project: Alice].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sie erzielen die höchste Punktzahl, woraufhin der Leiter von [Project: Alice] vorschlägt, [Alice] in die [Esper Guards] aufzunehmen. [Clock Rabbit] tritt gemeinsam mit ihr bei und wird an ihrer Seite auf den nächsten Kampf vorbereitet.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] and her bodyguard, [Clock Rabbit] trespass while [Project: Alice] is on.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}They record the highest score and the manager of [Project Alice] suggest [Alice] to join [Esper Guarder]. Also, [Clock Rabbit] joins together and gets training with Alice for the next battle.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] ve koruması, [Clock Rabbit] [Project: Alice] çalışırken izinsiz giriş yaparlar.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}En yüksek skoru elde ederler ve [Project Alice] yöneticisi [Alice] ‘in [Esper Guarder] ‘a katılmasını teklif eder. Ayrıca, [Clock Rabbit] de katılır ve bir sonraki savaş için Alice ile birlikte eğitilir.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] et son garde du corps, le [Lapin blanc], ressortent victorieux de la bataille.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}En fait, leurs prouesses sont telles que le général en chef du Projet Alice propose à la jeune fille de rejoindre les [Esper Guards]. Le [Lapin blanc] se joint à elle dans son entraînement intensif pour la prochaine bataille.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] y su guardaespaldas, [Clock Rabbit] trasgreden mientras está activo el [Proyecto Alice].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ellos registran el mayor puntaje y el director del [Proyecto Alice] sugieren que [Alice] se una al [Esper Guarder]. Además, [Clock Rabbit] se une y recibe entrenamiento junto a Alice para la próxima batalla.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Alice] e la sua guardia del corpo, [Clock Rabbit], fanno irruzione mentre [Project: Alice] è attivo.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ottengono il punteggio più alto e il responsabile di [Project Alice] consiglia a [Alice] di aggregarsi a [Esper Guarder]. Anche [Clock Rabbit] si aggrega e si addestra con Alice per la prossima battaglia.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}В момент запуска [Проекта: Alice] [Alice] и ее телохранитель [Clock Rabbit] совершили проступок. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Они вписали наивысший счет и менеджер [Проекта Alice] предложил [Alice] вступить в [Esper Guarder].[Clock Rabbit] тоже вступил в эту армию и вместе с Alice начал подготовку к грядущим битвам.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“爱丽丝计划”启动期间，“爱丽丝”和她的管家“兔子克拉克”意外闯入。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“爱丽丝计划”负责人注意到两人拥有高超的战斗技巧，曾达到过“超能卫队”从未达到过的高分。由于“爱丽丝”的性格难以掌控，负责人决定只邀请“兔子克拉克”加入“超能卫队”。但克拉克的条件是两人必须一起加入，为了计划的顺利进行，负责人同意了克拉克的条件。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}다르텐 / 다미아{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 리거연합{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : 유저 (아바타){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 부부 해결사{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : [리거]사이 뿐만 아니라 [도미닉] [더 월드]에서도 유명한 부부 해결사. 보수가 두둑하다면 어떤 의뢰든 실행하고, 수단과 방법을 가리지 않아 성공률은 높지만 평판이 좋지는 않다. [도미닉]의 [셜록&셜리]저지 의뢰를 받으면서 보수로 신무기인 [듀얼매그넘&샤프슈터]를 받는다. 평소 [셜록&셜리]커플을 라이벌로 생각하고 있으며 자신들의 의뢰를 빼앗아가고 있다고 생각한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : Spieler (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Störungsbeseitiger{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Paar von Störungsbeseitigern, das unter [Leaguern], [Dominic] und [The World] bekannt ist. Ihr Ruf ist nicht gut, aber für die entsprechende Bezahlung machen sie alles, was sie können. Erhalten [Dual Magnum & Sharpshoorter], um [Sherlock und Sherly] aufzuhalten. Sie betrachten [Sherlock und Sherly] als Rivalen und stehlen ihnen Aufträge.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Couple Trouble Shooter{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Famous couple trouble shooter among [Leaguer], [Dominic], and [The World]. Reputation is not good but do whatever they can if the pay is plenty. Receive [Dual Magnum & Sharpshoorter] for blocking [Sherlock & Sherly]. They think [Sherlock & Sherly] as rivals and steal requests.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : Kullanıcı (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Çifte Trouble Shooter{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : [Leaguer], [Dominic] ve [The World] arasında ünlü trouble shooter çift. Şöhretleri pek iyi değil ancak ücret yüksekse yapabileceklerinin en iyisini yaparlar. Reputation is not good but do whatever they can if the pay is plenty. [Sherlock & Sherly] çiftini bloklamak için [Dual Magnum & Sharpshoorter] alırlar. [Sherlock & Sherly] onlara göre rakiptir ve talepleri çalmaktadırlar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Alliance des Leagueurs{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : utilisateurs (avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Couple de tireurs d'élite{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : ce célèbre couple de tireurs d'élite a déjà fait parler de lui parmi les [Leagueurs], le gouvernement [Dominic] et [The World]. Leur réputation les précède et ils sont prêts à tout... si la récompense en vaut vraiment la chandelle. On leur a offert un [Dual Magnum & un Sharpshoorter] pour combattre les agents [Sherlock & Sherly], leurs ennemis.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Couple Trouble Shooter{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Famoso shooter de pareja entre [Leaguer], [Dominic], y [The World]. Su reputación no es buena pero hace todo lo posible si le pagan bien. Recibe [Dual Magnum y Sharpshoorter] por bloquear a [Sherlock y Sherly]. Ellos creen que [Sherlock y Sherly] son sus rivales y les roban pedidos.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation: Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player: Utente (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: coppia di tecnici riparatori{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: coppia di tecnici riparatori famosa tra [Leaguer], [Dominic], e [The World]. Non godono di buona reputazione ma fanno tutto il possibile se ben pagati. Ricevono [Dual Magnum & Sharpshoorter] per aver bloccato [Sherlock & Sherly]. Considerano [Sherlock & Sherly] rivali e rubano le richieste.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Darten / Damia{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Leaguer Альянс{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игроки : Пользователи (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Пара проблемных снайперов{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Известная пара проблемных снайперов среди [Leaguer], [Dominic], и [The World]. У них не очень хорошая репутация, но за хорошую плату они выполнят все прихоти. Получив [Dual Magnum & Sharpshoorter] они всячески пытаются помешать [Sherlock & Sherly], так как видят в них соперников и поэтому воруют все их задания.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}达斯坦/达米安{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：自由阵线{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：精英用户（虚拟替身）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：问题解决者{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：在“自由联盟”、“红蜂帝国”、“艾斯波科技”中都非常有名的问题解决者。只要报酬高，不管是什么委任都会接受。也因为不择手段，外界的评价并不高。“红蜂帝国”向“夏洛克&雪莉”发出任务邀请，报酬为全新的秘密武器“双持马格南&螺旋狙击枪”。平时把“夏洛克&雪莉”想成对手的他们，觉得“夏洛克&雪莉”抢走了自己的风头。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}셜록 / 셜리{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 리거연합{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : 유저 (아바타){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 커플 탐정{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 숨겨진 것을 추리하고 찾아내는 의뢰를 좋아하는 커플탐정. [도미닉]의 의뢰는 재미없고 따분하다는 인식이 있어 [도미닉]의 의뢰는 받아들이지 않는다. 서로 매우 의지하고 있으며, [더 월드]의 의뢰를 받아 [트레져]조사중 [다르텐&다미아]의 공격을 받는다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : Spieler (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Detektive{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Detektivpaar, das neue Aufträge und Geheimnisse liebt. Sie lehnen Aufträge von [Dominic] ab, weil diese langweilig sind und ihnen keinen Spaß machen. Im Auftrag von [The World] untersuchen sie [Treasure], werden dabei aber von [Darten und Damia] angegriffen.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Couple Detective{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Couple detective who loves new requests and reason secret. They refuse requests from [Dominic] because these are boring and no fun for them. Due to the request of [The World], they investigate [Treasure] but they are attacked by [Darten & Damia].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : Kullanıcı (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Detektif Çift{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : Yeni talepleri ve gizli sebepleri seven detektif çift. [Dominic] tarafından gönderilen talepleri reddediyorlar çünkü bu talepleri çok sıkıcı ve eğlencesiz buluyorlar. [The World] tarafından gönderilen talep yüzünden, [Treasure] hakkında araştırma yapıyorlar fakat [Darten & Damia] tarafından saldırıya uğruyorlar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : The World{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : utilisateurs (avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Couple de détectives{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : ce couple de détectives aime les nouveaux défis ! Toutefois, ils refusent toute demande du gouvernement [Dominic] pour éviter les conflits. Lorsqu'ils ont accepté d'enquêter sur les [Trésors] à la demande de [The World], ils étaient loin de se douter qu'ils seraient pris pour cible par [Darten & Damia].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Couple Detective{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Detective de parejas al que le encanta recibir nuevos pedidos y secretos. Rechazan pedidos de [Dominic] porque son aburridos y no los divierten. Por pedido de [The World], investigan el [Treasure] pero son atacados por [Darten y Damia].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Leaguer Alliance{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: utente (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: coppia di detective{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: coppia di detective che ama le nuove richieste e indaga i segreti. Rifiutano le richieste provenienti da [Dominic] perché troppo noiose e non abbastanza interessanti per loro. Su richiesta di [The World], indagano [Treasure] ma vengono attaccati da [Darten & Damia].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Sherlock / Sherly{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Leaguer Альянс{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игроки : Пользователи (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Пара детективов{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Пара детективов, которые любят новые задания, и искать ответы на все секреты. Они отказываются помогать [Dominic] правительству, потому что их поручения всегда скучны и неинтересны. По просьбе [The World] они отправились на поиски [Сокровищ], но на их путь встали [Darten & Damia].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}夏洛克&雪莉{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：自由阵线{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：精英用户（虚拟替身）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：情侣侦探{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：喜欢通过推理找出隐藏的东西，潜意识里认为“红蜂帝国”的委托非常无趣，所以拒绝了“红蜂帝国”的委托，转而接受了“艾斯波科技”的调查任务，在前往“展览中心”的途中受到“达斯坦&达米安”的攻击。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}정예병들을 앞세운 [도미닉]은 [리거]들 에게서 다시 주도권을 잡기위해 2차 전쟁을 준비한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}이 정보를 획득한 [더 월드]는 하루빨리 특별프로젝트의 완성을 위해 [리거]에게 히든 코드발굴을 의뢰하고 [셜록&셜리]가 의뢰를 받아들인다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] bereitet mit seinen erprobten Kriegern einen erneuten Überfall auf die [Leaguers] vor.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] erfährt von seinen Plänen und will, dass die [Leaguers] den geheimen Code aufdecken. [Sherlock und Sherly] nehmen den Auftrag an.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] with veteran solders prepares a raid [Leaguer] again to take the initiative.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] acquires this information and request excavating hidden code to [Leaguer] and [Sherlock and Sherly] take this request.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] inisiyatifi almak için yeniden veteran askerlerden oluşan bir [Leaguer] raid’i kurar.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] bu bilgiyi ele geçirir ve [Leaguer] tarafına gizli kodun kazılmasını söyler, bu talebi [Sherlock and Sherly] alır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Le gouvernement[Dominic] veut se débarasser des Leagueurs une bonne fois pour toute.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Mais [The World], qui a eu vent de ces nouvelles, demande à [Sherlock et Sherly] de découvrir les anciens codes pour devancer les conspirations du gouvernement.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] con los soldados veteranos preparan una redada [Leaguer] nuevamente para tomar la iniciativa.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] recibe esta información y solicita revelar el código oculto al [Leaguer] y [Sherlock y Sherly] aceptan este pedido.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] prepara un raid [Leaguer] con soldati esperti per attaccare ancora di sua iniziativa.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] lo viene a sapere e chiede a [Leaguer] di indagare il codice nascosto e [Sherlock and Sherly] si assumono questo compito.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Dominic] и ветераны их армии готовятся к рейдовой атаке на [Leaguer], чтобы восстановить свое влияние.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] узнали о планах правительства и попросили [Sherlock и Sherly] передать секретный код [Leaguer] пользователям.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“红蜂帝国”为了重新夺回对“自由联盟”的控制权，正在秘密筹划第二次战争。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}获得这个情报的“艾斯波科技”为了尽早完成特别项目，决定在“自由联盟”中雇佣人员寻找隐藏代码，“夏洛克&雪莉”接受了这个委托。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[트레져]에 도달한 [셜록&셜리]는 탐사를 시작한다. 그러던 중 갑자기 공격을 받고 당황한다. 이들을 공격한 인물은 [다르텐&다미아]로 전쟁을 준비하며 여력이 없던 [도미닉]이 [다르텐&다미아]를 고용하여 [셜록&셜리]저지를 의뢰한 것이다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[도미닉]에서 지급한 신무기 [듀얼매그넘]과 [샤프슈터]를 사용하는 [다르텐&다미아]에게 [셜록&셜리]는 밀리기 시작하고 [셜리]는 급기야 지하로 떨어지고 만다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}지하로 추락한 [셜리]는 찾고 있던 히든코드를 발견하고 이를 실행시킨다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock und Sherly] beginnen mit der Untersuchung von [Treasure], werden aber von einem plötzlichen Angriff überrascht. [Darten und Damia] wurden von Dominic beauftragt, sie anzugreifen.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten und Damia] benutzen neue Waffen, [Dual Magnum & Sharpshooter], wodurch [Sherlock und Sherly] unterlegen sind und in den Keller flüchten müssen.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] findet den Geheimcode und führt ihn aus.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock & Sherly] starts investigation in [Treasure] but they get flustered because of sudden attack. [Darten & Damia] who are hired by Dominic attack them.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten & Damia] use new weapons, [Dual Magnum & Sharpshooter] so [Sherlock & Sherly] are lack of strength and fall to the basement.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] finds the hidden code and runs it.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock & Sherly] [Treasure] ‘da araştırmaya başlar fakat ani bir atakla şaşkınlığa uğrarlar. Dominic tarafından onlara saldırsınlar diye kiralanan [Darten & Damia] onlara saldırır.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten & Damia] yeni silahlarını, [Dual Magnum & Sharpshooter] kullanmaktadır böylece [Sherlock & Sherly] gücünü yitirir ve yenilir.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] gizli kodu bulur ve onunla kaçar.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock & Sherly] commencent à enquêter sur les [Trésors] lorsqu'ils sont subitement attaqués : il s'agit de [Darten & Damia], embauchés par le gouvernement pour les arrêter.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten & Damia] sont équipés d'armes ultra-puissantes, le [Dual Magnum & le Sharpshooter]. [Sherlock & Sherly], qui ne peuvent rien faire pour lutter, sont contraints de quitter les lieux.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] parvint par chance à récupérer les codes qu'ils recherchaient et les utilise.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock y Sherly] comienzan una investigación en [Treasure] pero se ponen nerviosos por un ataque sorpresivo. [Darten y Damia] quienes están contratados por Dominic, los atacan.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten y Damia] utilizan nuevas armas, [Dual Magnum y Sharpshooter] para que [Sherlock y Sherly] se queden sin fuerza y caigan al piso.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] encuentra el código oculto y lo ejecuta .
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock & Sherly] cominciano a indagare [Treasure] ma sono colpiti da un attacco inaspettato. [Darten & Damia] li attaccano assolti da Dominic.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten & Damia] usano le nuove armi [Dual Magnum & Sharpshooter], di conseguenza [Sherlock & Sherly] restano privi di forza e cadono a terra.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherly] trova il codice nascosto e lo fa funzionare.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Sherlock & Sherly] начинают исследование [Сокровищ], но их поиски прерывает неожиданная атака. Нанятые Dominic правительством [Darten & Damia] вызвали их на битву. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Darten & Damia] достав новые оружия [Dual Magnum & Sharpshooter], не дав выбора [Sherlock & Sherly], заставили их спрятаться в здании.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Там [Sherly] нашла секретный код и запустила его.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}到达“展览中心”的“夏洛克&雪莉”开始展开调查，却因受到袭击而惊慌失措。攻击他们的正是“达斯坦&达米安”。正在全力准备战争而无心它事的“红蜂帝国”，雇佣“达斯坦&达米安”前来阻止“夏洛克&雪莉”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“达斯坦&达米安”使用了“红蜂帝国”提供的秘密武器“双持马格南”和“螺旋狙击枪”，使得“夏洛克&雪莉”渐渐处于劣势。最终，“雪莉”掉落到了地底。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}但掉落到地底的“雪莉”却意外发现了正在寻找的隐藏代码，并启动了它。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}릴리트 MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 더 월드 (파워즈){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 파워즈의 리더.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 더 월드에서 넷 스피어 점령을 위해 흩어진 소스를 모아 변형과정을 거친 릴리트의 개량형 프로그램. 릴리트의 이성과 감성을 지우고 에스퍼 가드의 분노와 전투AI만을 계승하고 전투 능력을 올렸다. 릴리트의 기억을 계승하고 있지만 지금은 파워즈의 리더로서 도미닉과 리거의 붕괴를 목표로 하고 있음.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : The World (Powers){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Anführer von Powers{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Verbessertes Programm von Lilith. Sammlung verstreuter Codes zur Besetzung des Netsphere bei The World. Verliert an Intelligenz und Emotionen und erhöht sowohl Wut der [Esper Guards] als auch Kampfstärke der Kampf-AI. Obwohl sie die Erinnerungen Liliths geerbt hat, ist sie als Anführer von Powers auf die Vernichtung [Dominics] und der [Leaguers] konzentriert.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : The World (Powers){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Leader of Powers.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : An improved program of Lilith, which is a collection of scattered sources for occupying Netsphere at The World. Loses intellect and emotion and increases anger of [Esper Guard] and fighting strength as the combat AI. Focusing on collapse of [Dominic] and [Leaguer] as a leader of Powers even though inheried the memory of Lilith.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : The World (Powers){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Powers’ın Lideri.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : The World’deki Netsphere’i işgal etmek için gerekli kaynaklardan oluşan, Lilith’in geliştirilmiş bir programı. Zeka ve duyguyu kaybetmiş, [Esper Guard] öfkesini ve savaş gücünü kombat AI olarak geliştirmiştir. Powers’ın lideri olarak [Dominic] ve [Leaguer] ‘ın yıkımına odaklanmış ve hatta Lilith’in hafızasını taşımaktadır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : The World{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : Chef des Puissances.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : programme avancé de Lilith né de la recherche de plusieurs années de travail. Elle est dépourvue d'émotions et de libre arbitre : son unique mission est de détruire [Dominic] et les [Leagueurs]. Sa force ? Les souvenirs qu'elle a hérité de Lilith lors de sa création.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación: The World (Powers){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Leader of Powers.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Un programa mejorado de Lilith, que es una colección de fuentes dispersas para ocupar la Netsphere en The World. Pierde el intelecto y la emoción y aumenta la ira de [Esper Guard] y el poder de lucha como el AI de combate. Se centra en el colapso de [Dominic] y [Leaguer] como el líder de Powers aunque heredaron la memoria de Lilith.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: The World (poteri){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: capo di Powers.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: un programma di Lilith migliorato, una collezione di fonti sparse per occupare Netsphere a The World. Perde la ragione e il sentimento e aumenta la rabbia di [Esper Guard] e la forza di combattimento per quanto riguarda la lotta di AI. Come capo di Powers, punta sulla rovina di [Dominic] e [Leaguer], anche se ha ereditato i ricordi di Lilith.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Lilith MK2.{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : The World (Powers){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Лидер Powers организации.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Улучшенная программа Lilith представляет собой набор рассеянных источников для оккупации Netsphere от The World влияния. У нее нет ни интеллекта, ни эмоций, только повышенная злость от [Esper Guard] и великолепная боевая подготовка как у AI. Ее внимание сосредоточено на распаде [Dominic] правительства и [Leaguer], так как их лидер Powers организации унаследовал память Lilith.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}强袭莉莉丝{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：艾斯波科技（异能军团）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：异能军团的领导者{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：艾斯波科技为了夺回极限战网，搜集被摧毁后的莉莉丝的零件，重新制造的改良版莉莉丝。删除了莉莉丝的理性和感性，并着重提升了战斗能力。被任命为异能军团领导者的莉莉丝，虽然继承了之前的记忆，但一心只想破坏红蜂帝国和自由联盟。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}베스 / 베리{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 더 월드 (파워즈){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : 유저 (아바타){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 파워즈 초대 맴버로 릴리트 MK2와 함께 넷 스피어 1차 점령에 참여.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 더 월드에서 고용한 용병으로, 넷 스피어 점령을 목표로 하는 무력단체 파워즈의 초대 멤버이다. 로이와 2인조로 넷스피어를 무대로 싸움만 할 수 있다면 가리지 않고 어떤 일도 해결했던 유능한 해결사. 자존심이 강한 성격으로 평소에는 온순한 성격의 (베리)지만 자존심이 상하는 일이 있으면 터프하고 잔인한 (베스)로 변하게 되는 이중인격의 소유자. 자존심이 강해 누군가의 로이의 말을 제외한 어느 누구의 명령도 듣지 않지만 천문학적인 액수의 돈 때문에 릴리트 MK2 밑에서 용병 활동을 하고 있다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : Spieler (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Vorübergehende Mitglieder von Powers. Nehmen mit Lilith MK2 an ihrem ersten Krieg teil.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Angestellte von The World und vorübergehende Mitglieder von Powers. Talentierte Störungsbeseitiger, die mit Roy zusammenarbeiten. [Berry] ist stolz und nett, verwandelt sich jedoch in die kaltherzige und grausame [Beth], wenn ihr Stolz verletzt wird. Hören nur auf Roys Befehle, arbeiten aber wegen der Aussicht auf eine fürstliche Belohnung für [Lilith MK2].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Guests of Powers. Participate to the first war with Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Staff of The World and guest member of Powers. Talented trouble shooter who works with Roy. [Berry] is prideful and gentle but becomes tough and cruel [Beth] if her pride is hurted. Only obey Roy's order but works for [Lilith MK2] because of an exorbitant reward.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : Kullanıcı (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Powers’ın konukları. Lilith MK2 ile ilk savaşa katılır.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : The World ekibi ve Powers’ın konuk üyesi. Roy ile birlikte çalışan yetenekli trouble shooter. [Berry] gururlu ve kibardır fakat serttir ve acımasız [Beth] gururu incinirse kötücüldür. Sadece Roy’un emirlerine uyar fakat [Lilith MK2] için çalışır, çünkü ödül çok büyüktür.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : utilisateurs (avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : membre des Puissances, elle participe à la première bataille aux côtés de Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : travaillant pour The World et membre des Puissances, elle travaille sous les ordres de Roy. [Berry] est une ange, noble et docile, qui se transforme en véritable démon, la maléfique [Beth], lorsque sa fiereté est attaquée. Elle n'obéit qu'à Roy mais elle a accepté de travailler pour [Lilith MK2] en raison de la récompense exorbitante qu'elle lui a proposé.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : User (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Miembros invitados de Powers Participa en la primera guerra con Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Miembro de The World y miembro invitado de Powers. Talentoso shooter que trabaja con Roy. [Berry] es orgulloso y amable pero se vuelve duro y cruel [Beth] si tocan su orgullo. Sólo obedece las órdenes de Roy, pero trabaja para [Lilith MK2] para recibir una exorbitante recompensa.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: utente (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: Ospiti di Powers. Partecipano alla prima guerra con Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: personale di The World e membro ospite di Powers. Tecnico riparatore di talento che lavora con Roy. [Berry] è orgogliosa e gentile ma diventa la dura e crudele [Beth] se si sente ferita nel suo orgoglio. Obbedisce solo agli ordini di Roy ma lavora per [Lilith MK2] per via di una ricompensa esorbitante.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Beth / Berry{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : Пользователь (Avatar){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Гость Powers организации. Участник первой войны с Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Сотрудник The World корпорации и гость в Powers ассоциации. Талантливая Trouble-shooter, зачастую работающая с Roy в паре. Обычно [Berry] гордая и нежная, но если к ней не проявляют должное уважение, она может стать агрессивной и порой даже жестокой [Beth]. Она выполняет только приказы от Roy, но также взяла приказ от [Lilith MK2] из-за чрезмерно высокой оплаты.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}贝丝/贝瑞{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：艾斯波科技（异能军团）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：精英用户（虚拟替身）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：异能军团成员/与强袭莉莉丝一起参加“极限战网”第一次争夺战{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：艾斯波科技雇佣的佣兵。加入了以夺取极限战网为目的的武装组织，异能军团。与罗伊组成的二人组，是极限战网中有名的问题解决者。平时是性格温顺的“贝瑞”，但自尊心极强。一旦自尊心受伤，就会变成强硬残忍的“贝丝”，是典型的双重人格。除了罗伊的命令外，谁的话也不听。为了获得天文数字般的报酬，在强袭莉莉丝手下当佣兵。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}로이{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●소속 : 더 월드 (파워즈){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●플레이어 : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●역할 : 파워즈 초대 맴버로 릴리트 Mk2와 함께 넷 스피어 1차 점령에 참여.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●시놉시스 : 더 월드의 고용 된 용병 리더. [베리/베스]를 데리고 다니며 넷스피어에서 돈을 준다면 가리지 않고 무슨 일이라도 하는 용병이다. 2인조로 활동하며 누구의 밑에도 들어가지 않는 유능한 용병이지만 더 월드 컴퍼니에서 제안한 돈을 보고 릴리트 MK2 를 따르고 있다. 겉으로는 릴리트 MK2의 명령을 따르고 있지만, 실제로는 그저 받은 만큼 일을 한다는 생각으로 명령을 따르고 있으며 릴리트 MK2를 따르는 것이 아니다 라는 생각을 하고 있다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zugehörigkeit : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spieler : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rolle : Vorübergehendes Mitglied von Powers. Nimmt mit Lilith MK2 an seinem ersten Krieg teil.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zusammenfassung : Anführer, der für The World arbeitet. Gegen gute Bezahlung erledigt er zusammen mit [Berry und Beth] jeden Auftrag. Arbeitet im Team und folgt niemandem außer [Lilith MK2], weil eine fürstliche Belohnung durch The World in Aussicht steht. Scheinbar folgt er den Befehlen von Lilith MK2, doch für ihn ist es lediglich ein Auftrag.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Player : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role : Guests of Powers. Participate to the first war with Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : Leader who works for The World. Does whatever he can with [Berry/Beth] if the pay is good. Work as a pair and do not follow anyone except [Lilith MK2] because of an exorbitant reward from The World. Looks like he is obeying the order of Lilith MK2 but he thinks he is just working, not obeying Lilith MK2.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Üyelik : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oyuncu : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rol : Powers’ın konukları. Lilith MK2 ile ilk savaşa katılır.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Sinopsis : The World için çalışan lider. Ücret iyi ise, [Berry/Beth] ile elinden gelenin en iyisini yapar. Çift olarak çalışırlar ve [Lilith MK2] dışında kimsenin emirlerini uygulamazlar çünkü The World’ün verdiği ödül büyüktür. Lilith MK2’nin kurallarına uyuyormuş gibi görünür ama sadece çalışıyordur, Lilith MK2’ye itaat etmiyordur.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliation : Esper Guards (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Joueur : I.A.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Rôle : membre des Puissances, il participe à la première bataille aux côtés de Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis : il collabore avec [Berry/Beth] du moment que la récompense est assez élevée. Ils travaillent ensemble et ensemble uniquement : s'ils ont accepté de se battre aux côtés de [Lilith MK2], c'est uniquement à cause de la récompense extraordinaire qu'elle leur a proposé. Il se plie à ses exigeances et pourtant, il est clair qu'il ne lui obéit pas.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Asociación : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Jugador : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Función : Miembro invitado de Powers. Participa en la primera guerra con Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Resumen : Líder que trabaja para The World. Hace todo lo posible con [Berry/Beth] si la paga es buena. Trabaja como un par y no sigue a nadie excepto a [Lilith MK2] por la exorbitante recompensa que recibe de The World. Parece como que obedece las órdenes de Lilith MK2, pero el cree que sólo está trabajando, no obedeciendo a Lilith MK2.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Affiliazione: Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Giocatore: AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Role: ospiti di Powers. Partecipano alla prima guerra con Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Synopsis: capo che lavora per The World. Fa tutto ciò che può con [Berry/Beth] se ben pagato. Lavorano in coppia e non seguono nessuno tranne [Lilith MK2] per via di una ricompensa esorbitante da The World. Sembra che esegua gli ordini di Lilith MK2, ma in realtà egli pensa che sta solo lavorando, e non obbedendo a Lilith MK2.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Roy{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Связь : Esper Guard (Dominic){N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Игрок : AI {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Роль : Гость Powers организации. Участник первой войны с Lilith MK2.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Краткий обзор : Лучший работник The World корпорации. Если оплата хорошая, то тогда вместе с [Berry/Beth] он делает все, что только возможно сделать. Работает в паре и ни за кем не следует кроме [Lilith MK2] из-за чрезмерно высокой оплаты от The World. Кажется, что он повинуется каждому приказу Lilith MK2, однако он думает, что просто выполняет свою работу.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}罗伊{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●势力：艾斯波科技（异能军团）{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●角色：人工智能 {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●职能：异能军团成员/与强袭莉莉丝一起参加“极限战网”第一次争夺战{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●简介：受雇于艾斯波科技的佣兵领导者。带着“贝丝/贝瑞”一起组成二人组，在极限战网从事佣兵工作，只要给钱不管什么事都会做。因为艾斯波科技提供了丰厚的报酬，而选择跟随强袭莉莉丝。表面上听从强袭莉莉丝的命令，内心却只认为自己是在敬业地工作，而非强袭莉莉丝的走卒。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[더 월드]는 넷 스피어의 성장에 매력을 느끼고 넷 스피어 파괴에서 넷 스피어의 점령으로 방향을 선회 한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[더 월드]에서 몰래 심어놓은 [아이스 스퀘어]가 [리거]들에게 열리고 터치다운 리그 중이던 [아이스 스퀘어] 하늘에 마법진이 펼쳐지며 [릴리트MK2.]가 [타키온 아이언 부츠]를 착용한 상태로 내려온다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[아이스 스퀘어] 양 진영에서 [베리]와 [터렛Mk2.]를 착용한 [로이]가 함께 들어선다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[베리]가 폭주하여 [베스]로 변하고 무차별 공격을 시작한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] hat das Wachstum der Netsphere ins Auge gefasst und hat statt der Zerstörung nun die Übernahme der Netsphere zum Ziel.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Bei [The World] wird der geheime [Ice Square] für [Leaguers] zugänglich gemacht. Bei einem Touchdown erscheint ein magischer Ort am Himmel. Dann schwebt [Lilith MK2] mit ihren [Tachyon Iron Boots] hinab.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] und [Roy] greifen von beiden Seiten des [Ice Squares] mit einer [Turret MK2] an.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] wird wütend und verwandelt sich in [Beth] und greift ohne Rücksicht auf Verluste an.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] is attracted to the growth of Netsphere and has changed the object from destroying Netsphere to capturing Netsphere.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}At [The World], secretly hid [Ice Square] is opened to [Leaguer] and magical position is spread in the sky in the middle of Touchdown. Then, [Lilith MK2] is coming down from the magical position and wearing [Tachyon Iron Boots].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] and [Roy] enter from both camps in [Ice Square] with [Turret MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] gets mad and turns into [Beth] and attacks indiscriminately.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] Netsphere’in büyümesini çekici bulur ve Netsphere’i yok etme görevini değiştirerek Netsphere’i elde etmeye amacına dönüştürür.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] ‘de, gizlenen [Ice Square] [Leaguer] için açılır ve Touchdown’ın tam ortasında gökyüzünde büyülü bir pozisyona yerleşir. Daha sonra, [Lilith MK2] büyülü pozisyondan aşağıya gelir ve [Tachyon Iron Boots] giymektedir.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] ve [Roy] [Ice Square]’deki iki kamptan [Turret MK2] ile girerler.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] çıldırır ve [Beth] ‘e dönüşür ve fütursuzca saldırır.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] est de plus en plus attiré par la croissance exponentielle de la Netsphere : l'objectif n'est plus de la détruire mais de la capturer.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}La base secrète de [The World], [Ice Square], est ouverte aux Leagueurs grâce à un cristal puissant qui dessine une ligne dans le ciel. [Lilith MK2], alertée par ce signal, entre dans le champs de bataille.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}D'un côté, [Berry] et [Roy], armés de la [Turret MK2]. De l'autre, [Lilith MK2] assistée par [The World].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Les deux opposants se lancent alors dans un combat sans merci.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] se siente atraído por el crecimiento de la Netsphere y ha cambiado su objetivo, de destruir a la Netsphere a capturar a la Netsphere.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255es}En [The World], el secretamente escondido [Ice Square]se abre al [Leaguer] y la posición mágica se extiende en el cielo en el medio del Touchdown. Luego, [Lilith MK2] baja de la posición mágica usando [Tachyon Iron Boots].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] y [Roy] ingresan de ambos campos en [Ice Square] con [Turret MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] se enoja y arremete contra [Beth], atacándolo de forma indiscriminada.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] è attratto dalla crescita di Netsphere e non ha più l'obiettivo di distruggere Netsphere ma di occuparla.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}A [The World], il segreto [Ice Square] viene rivelato a [Leaguer] e la posizione magica viene svelata nel cielo, nel centro di Touchdown. In quel momento, [Lilith MK2] scende dalla posizione magica e indossa [Tachyon Iron Boots].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] e [Roy] fanno il loro ingresso in [Ice Square] da entrambi gli accampamenti con [Turret MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] si arrabbia e si trasforma in [Beth], attaccando alla cieca.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] корпорация постоянно следит за развитием Netsphere, что в итоге сменило их план уничтожения на захват Netsphere. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[The World] открыли таинственный [Ice Square] для всех [Leaguer] пользователей и теперь магическая зона располагается в небе прямо в центре Touchdown локации. Чуть позже [Lilith MK2] используя [Tachyon Iron Boots] спустилась с магической зоны. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Berry] и [Roy] вошли на локацию с двух разных баз установив новые [Turret MK2]. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Подобная суета разозлила [Berry] и она перешла на личность [Beth], которая тут же начала безразборное нападение.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}因为“极限战网”的飞速成长，“艾斯波科技”将目标从“破坏”转为“占领”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“艾斯波科技”暗中向“自由联盟”开启了“冰之领域”后，在正处于夺旗竞技中的“冰之领域”上空，”强袭莉莉丝”装备着“超光速浮空战靴”落下。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“贝瑞”和装备了“光盾炮塔”的“罗伊”一同进入。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}随后，“贝瑞”暴走变为“贝丝”，向“自由联盟”展开了野蛮的攻击。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}그들은 [더 월드]의 최초 개량형 무기인 [터렛Mk2.]와 오리지널 무기 [타키온 아이언 부츠]를 각각 착용하고 [릴리트 MK2]와 함께 [리거]들을 공격한다.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[리거]들은 혼신으로 반격하지만 [로이]의 [터렛Mk2.]에 의해 모든 공격이 막힌다. 상대가 되지 않음을 깨달은 [리거]들은 도망치고 [아카데미]의 질서유지부대가 투입되어 이들에게 무차별 진압을 시도하지만, 무산되고 만다. 조용해진 공간에서 [릴리트Mk2.]는 [파워즈]의 결성을 선언한다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Mit der [Turret MK2] und den [Tachyon Iron Boots] greifen sie die [Leaguers] und [Lilith MK2] an.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Die [Leaguers] geben alles, jedoch werden ihre Angriffe von [Roy]s [Turret MK2] abgewehrt. Die [Leaguers] laufen davon. Der Versuch der Armee der [Akademie], die [Leaguers] zu unterdrücken, schlägt fehl. [Lilith MK2] verkündet die Gründung der Organisation [Powerz].
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}They have [Turret MK2] and wear [Tachyon Iron Boots] and attacks [Leaguers] with [Lilith MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] put every ounce of their energy but their attacks are blocked by [Roy]'s [Turret MK2]. [Leaguers] run away and the army from [Academy] tries to suppress [Leaguers] but it is foundered. [Lilith MK2] announces the organization of [Powerz].
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Ellerinde [Turret MK2] vardır ve [Tachyon Iron Boots] giymektedirler ve [Lilith MK2] ile [Leaguers] ‘a saldırır.{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] tüm enerjilerini ortaya koyar ancak saldırıları [Roy] ‘un [Turret MK2] ‘si ile bloke edilir. [Leaguers] kaçar ve [Academy] ordusu [Leaguers] ‘ı zaptetmeye çalışır fakat başarısız olurlar. [Lilith MK2] [Powerz] organizasyonunu duyurur.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Personne n'est épargné. Les Leagueurs essayent tant bien que mal de repousser les attaques incessantes de [Roy].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}La [Turret MK2] est bien trop puissante et les Leagueurs ne peuvent plus lutter contre les forces ennemies - ils battent en retraite. [Lilith MK2] décide de créer l'organisation des [Puissances].
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Tienen el [Turret MK2] y usan [Tachyon Iron Boots], y atacan a los [Leaguers] con [Lilith MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] ponen cada gramo de su energía pero sus ataques son bloqueados por el [Turret MK2] de [Roy]. Los [Leaguers] escapan; el ejército de [Academy] intenta suprimir a los [Leaguers] pero fracasa. [Lilith MK2] anuncia la organización de [Powerz].
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Hanno [Turret MK2], indossano [Tachyon Iron Boots] e attaccano [Leaguers] con [Lilith MK2].{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] mettono tutte le loro energie nell'attacco ma sono bloccati dal [Turret MK2] di [Roy]. [Leaguers] scappano e l'esercito di [Academy] cerca di eliminare [Leaguers] ma viene affondato. [Lilith MK2] annuncia l'organizzazione di [Powerz].
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Активировав [Turret MK2] и [Tachyon Iron Boots], вместе с [Lilith MK2] они атакуют [Leaguers]. {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}[Leaguers] прилагают все свои усилия, но все их атаки подавляет [Turret MK2] от [Roy]. [Leaguers] обращаются в бегство от армии [Академии], но побег оказался неуспешным. В итоге [Lilith MK2] возглавила организацию [Powerz].
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}贝丝和罗伊装备了“艾斯波科技”最新的改良型武器“光盾炮塔”和“超光速浮空战靴”，并与”强袭莉莉丝”一起攻击“自由联盟”。{W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}“自由联盟”虽然全力反击，但由于“罗伊”的“光盾炮塔”阻挡了所有攻击，意识到自己实力不济的“自由联盟”落荒而逃。“阿卡德米”虽然投入了大量的武装组织对他们进行强行镇压，但均告失败。在逐渐沉寂的“冰之领域”里，”强袭莉莉丝”宣布“异能军团”正式成立。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}아이템 분해란?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●인벤토리에 사용하지 않는 아이템을 분해하여 아이템 조합의 재료로 변환시킵니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●분해가 가능한 아이템 : 무기단품 / 복장단품 / 펫.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●분해가 가능한 형태 : 기간제 / 내구제 / 유니크.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Was bedeutet 'Itemzerlegung'?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Nutzlose Items im Inventar können zerlegt werden, um Elemente für die Itemherstellung zu erhalten.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zerlegbare Items: Weapon / Costume / Pet.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Zerlegbare Itemtypen: Zeitlich begrenzt / Permanent / Einzigartig.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}What is Item Dismantling?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Dismantle unused items in inventory to obtain elements for crafting.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Items can be dismantled: Unit Weapon / Unit Costume / Pet.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Forms can be dismantled : Non-permanent / Permanent/ Unique.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Item Dismantling Nedir?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Envanterindeki kullanılmamış eşyaları crafting elementleri elde etmek için parçala.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Parçalanabilen eşyalar: Unit Silah / Unit Kostüm / Pet.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Parçalanabilen formlar : Kalıcı olmayan / Kalıcı / Unique.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Qu'est-ce que le Démantèlement ?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Démantelez des objets que vous n'utilisez plus pour obtenir des pièces utilisables dans la Fabrication.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Objets pouvant être démantelés : Armes/Costumes/Familiers. {N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Types d'objets pouvant être démantelés : Non-permanent/Permanent/Unique.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}¿De qué se trata el desmontaje de artículos?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Desmonta los artículos no utilizados en el inventario para obtener elementos para la producción.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Artículos que pueden ser desmontados: Unidad Arma / Unidad Costume / Mascota.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Formas que pueden ser desmontadas : No permanente / Permanente/ Único.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Cos'è la demolizione oggetto?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Demolisci oggetti non utilizzati nell'inventario per ottenere elementi per costruire oggetti.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Oggetti che possono essere demoliti: Unit Weapon / Unit Costume / Pet.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Forme che possono essere demolite: Non-permanent / Permanent/ Unique.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Что такое демонтаж предмета?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Разберите ненужные предметы из инвентаря, чтобы получить элементы для создания.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Предметы, которые можно разобрать: Цельные оружия / Цельные костюмы / Питомцы.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Виды предметов, которые можно разобрать: Временные / Неограниченные / Уникальные.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}재료의 종류는?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●아이템을 분해하여 획득하는 재료는 총 7가지 입니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Normal재료 : Gear1 ~5까지의 부품이며 아이템 조합을 위해 필수로 필요한 부품입니다. 좋은 아이템을 조합하기위해서는 높은 등급의 Gear부품을 많이 투자해야합니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Special재료 : Cell과 Core가 있으며, 조합시 Normal재료에 Special재료를 첨가하면 내구재 혹은 유니크 아이템 중에 하나를 획득하게됩니다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Welche Elemente gibt es?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Es gibt 7 verschiedene Elemente, die man bei der Itemzerlegung erhalten kann.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Normale Elemente: Normale Elemente der Stufe 1 bis 5 werden für die Itemherstellung benötigt. Je höher das Elementlevel, desto besser das Endprodukt.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Spezialelemente: Cell und Core. Benutzt man bei der Itemherstellung zusätzlich ein Spezialelement, hat man die Chance auf ein permanentes oder ein einzigartiges Item.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Kind of Elements?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}There are 7 kinds of elements that can be acquired from dismantling.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Normal Element : Gear 1 to 5 and required elements for item crafting. In order to craft better items, need gears with higher levels.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Special Element : Cell and Core. If special element is added to Normal element, you can acquire one of Permanent or Unique item.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Element Çeşitleri?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Parçalama işlemiyle elde edebileceğiniz 7 çeşit element var.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Normal Element : 1'den 5'e kadar donanım ve eşya yapmak için gereklidir. Daha iyi eşyalar yapmak için, daha yüksek seviyeli eşyalar gerekir.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Özel Element : Cell ve Core. Eğer Normal elemente özel element eklenirse, bir Kalıcı veya Unique eşya elde edersiniz.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Les types de pièces ?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Il existe 7 types de pièces que vous pouvez obtenir grâce au démantèlement.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Pièces classiques : équipements de 1 à 5 et objets requis pour la fabrication d'objets. Pour fabriquer de meilleurs objets, utilisez des équipements de niveau plus élevés.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Pièces spéciales : cellules et noyaux. Si des pièces spéciales sont ajoutées en complément des pièces classiques, vous pourrez obtenir des objets permanents ou uniques.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}¿Cuáles son los tipos de elementos?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Hay 7 tipos de elementos que pueden ser adquiridos a partir del desmontaje.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Elemento normal : Equipamiento 1 a 5 y elementos requeridos para la producción de artículos. Para producir aún mejores artículos, se necesita equipamiento con mayor nivel.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Elemento especial : Cell y Core. Si el elemento especial se agrega al elemento normal, podrás adquirir un artículo único o permanente.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Tipi di elementi?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ci sono 7 tipi di elementi che possono essere ottenuti dalla demolizione.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Elemento normale: Attrezzatura 1 a 5 e gli elementi richiesti per la costruzione dell'oggetto. Per costruire oggetti migliori, occorrono attrezzature con livelli più elevati.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Elemento speciale: Cell e Core. Se un elemento speciale viene aggiunto a un elemento normale, puoi ottenere un oggetto Permanent oppure Unique.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Виды элементов?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Есть 7 видов элементов, которые можно получить, разобрав предмет.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Обычный элемент: Gear 1-5 уровня и другие предметы для создания предметов. Для создания улучшенных предметов требуется Gear предмет с более высоким уровнем.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Особый элемент: Cell и Core. Если особый предмет добавить к обычному элементу, то тогда можно получить один неограниченный или уникальный предмет.
string.cns: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}【材料种类】{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●分解道具获得的材料总共有7种。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●普通材料:组合道具所需的Ⅰ型~Ⅴ型齿轮。组合高级道具需要投入高等级的齿轮零件。{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●特殊材料:电池和处理器。组合道具时，往普通材料里添加特殊材料，可以获得永久道具或特典道具。

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}분해를 하기위해선?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step1 : 메인버튼에서 [인챈트]버튼을 눌러 인챈트 페이지로 이동합니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step2 : 인챈트 페이지에서 [아이템 분해]버튼을 누르면 전용 페이지로 이동합니다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Wo findet man die Itemzerlegung?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 1: Klick auf [Enchant], um die Enchant-Anzeige zu öffnen.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 2: Klick auf [Itemzerlegung], um das Fenster zur Itemzerlegung zu öffnen.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}For Dismantling?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step1 : Click on [Enchant] and move to Enchant page.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step2 : Click on [Item Dismantling] for moving to Dismantling page.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Dismantling için?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Adım 1 : [Enchant] 'a tıkla ve Enchant sayfasına git.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Adım 2 : Dismantling sayfasına gitmek için [Item Dismantling] 'e tıkla.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Comment Démanteler ?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Étape 1 : cliquez sur [Enchant] pour ouvrir la page de l'Enchantement.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Étape 2 : cliquez sur [Démantèlement] pour accéder à la page du Démantèlement.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}¿Qué hay que hacer para desmontar?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Paso1 : Haz clic en [Enchant] y visita la página de Enchant.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Paso2 : Haz clic en [Item Dismantling] para visitar la página de desmontaje.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Per la demolizione?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step 1: Clicca su [Enchant] e vai alla pagina Enchant.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step 2: Clicca su [Item Dismantling] per andare alla pagina della demolizione.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}О демонтаже?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Шаг 1 : Нажмите на [Чарование], а затем перейдите на страницу чарования.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255} Шаг 2 : Нажмите на [Демонтаж предмета], чтобы перейти на страницу демонтажа.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●이제 인벤토리에서 각 아이템 슬롯의 아이콘 하단에 [분해하기]버튼이 있습니다. {N}●버튼을 누르면 페이지로 이동하지않고 인벤토리에서 팝업이 출력되어 해당아이템을 분해할수있습니다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Im Inventar wird [Zerlegen] jetzt bei jedem Item neben [Reparieren] angezeigt.{N}Mit einem Klick auf den Button [Zerlegen] öffnet man die Itemzerlegungsanzeige.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Now, there is [Dismantling] button on the right of [Repair] button for each item slot in Inventory.{N}Clicking on the button will show a pop-up for dismantling in Inventory.
string.tur: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Şimdi, envanterdeki her eşya slotu için, [Tamir] butonunun sağında bir [Dismantling] butonu var.{N}Butona basınca Envanter'de eşya parçalamak için bir pop-up açılacak.
string.fre: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Trouvez le bouton [Démantèlement] à droite du bouton [Réparer] sur chaque objet dans votre inventaire.{N}Lorsque vous cliquez dessus, une fenêtre s'ouvre afin de procéder au démantèlement.
string.spa: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Ahora, encontrarás un botón de [Dismantling] a la derecha del botón [Repair] para cada ranura de artículo en el inventario.{N}Haz clic en el botón y aparecerá un mensaje emergente para el desmontaje en el inventario.
string.ita: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Trovi il pulsante [Dismantling] sulla destra del pulsante [Repair] per ogni slot di oggetti nell'inventario.{N}Cliccando sul pulsante, apparirà una finestra per la demolizione nell'inventario.
string.rus: {W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Теперь на каждом предмете в инвентаре есть опция [Демонтаж] справа от [Починить].{N}Нажав на эту кнопку, откроется окно разборки предмета.

string.kor: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}분해 단계는?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step1 : 리스트에 분해가 가능한 아이템이 보여집니다. 이 중 분해할 아이템을 선택합니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step2 : 선택한 아이템의 분해량을 결정합니다. 최소 10일 이상 분해가 가능하며, 내구제/유니크 아이템은 입력 할 필요가 없습니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step3 : 분해량을 결정하면 획득가능성이 있는 재료를 표시해줍니다. 분해량이 높을수록 높은 등급의 재료를 획득합니다.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}●Step4 : [분해] 버튼을 누르면 분해를 실행합니다.
string.ger: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Wie funktioniert die Itemzerlegung?{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 1: Wähle das Item aus, das du zerlegen möchtest.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 2: Lege fest, wie viele Tage die Zerlegung dauern soll. Die Mindestdauer beträgt 10 Tage. Bei permanenten und einzigartigen Items muss keine Dauer angegeben werden.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 3: Nach der Festlegung der Zerlegungsdauer wird eine Liste der Endprodukte angezeigt. Je länger die Zerlegungsdauer, desto besser sind die Elemente, die du bekommst.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Schritt 4: Mit einem Klick auf [Zerlegen] wird der Zerlegungsprozess gestartet.
string.eng: {W}{F-2002_10}{A-C}{A-L}{CB-255,255,255,255}Steps for Dismantling{N}{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step1 : There is a list of items that can be dismantled and select an item to dismantle.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step2 : Decide the day(s) for dismantling of selected item. Minimum 10 days can be dismantled and do not need to enter for permanent/unique items.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step3 : When the days for dismantling are decided, display obtainable elements. As the days are longer, you can obtain higher level of elements.{N}{W}{F-2002_10}{S-N}{A-L}{CB-166,166,166,255}Step4 : Clicking on [Dismantle] will proceed dismantling.
